, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : &nbsp;<i>&nbsp;Glorious Saint Dismas, you alone of all the\ngreat Penitent Saints were directly canonised by Christ Himself;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>you were assured of a\nplace in Heaven with Him \"this day\" because of the sincere confession\nof your sins to Him in the tribunal of Calvary and your true sorrow for them as\nyou hung beside Him in that open confessional;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>you who by the direct\nsword thrust of your love and repentance did open the Heart of Jesus in mercy\nand forgiveness even before the centurion's spear tore it asunder;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>you whose face was\ncloser to that of Jesus in His last agony, to offer Him a word of comfort,\ncloser even than that of His Beloved Mother, Mary;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>you who knew so well\nhow to pray, teach me the words to say to Him to gain pardon and the grace of\nperseverance;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>and you who are so\nclose to Him now in Heaven, as you were during His last moments on earth, pray\nto Him for me that I shall never again desert Him, but that at the close of my\nlife I may hear from Him the words He addressed to you: \"This day thou\nshalt be with Me in Paradise.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Amen.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THIS IS THE MAHARISHI WHOM THE ENTIRE FAR EAST WORSHIPS.<br />\n<br />\nThe white christian invader has placed buddha at 563 BC. this buddha NO 2 ( A FOLLOWER ) is responsible for shunning vedas and sanskrit<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><b>the white christian invader has called lord Mahavira as the founder of jainism. This is absolutely wrong.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nEmperor Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri Bharata is the founder of Jainism in 8190 BC, and is the first Thirthankara.<br />\n<br />\nThe white historian has put Mahavira as a contemporary of Buddha at 599 BC. This is wrong . First of all&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>Mahavira was just a reformer. He was the 24th Thirtankara . Mahavira was born in 4500 BC.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\"><b>emperor ashoka born in 304 BC never existed.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nALL THESE TRUTHS WILL COME OUT OF THE RAT HOLE --LIKE GUMNAMI BABA SOON.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WROTE ABOUT GUMNAMI BABA HIDING LIKE A RAT IN A HOLE FOR 40 YEARS-- FROM HIS OWN INA MEN, 22000 EATEN BY JAPS -ALL SCORNED AND SCOFFED RIGHT ?<br />\n<br />\ntime will bear out !<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />LIKE A MAHAVIRA FOLLOWER WENT AGAINST HINDUISM AND REJECTED VEDAS , A BUDDHA FOLLOWER DID THE SAME -- AS THEY WERE CONTEMPORARIES 2450 YEARS AGO. started a FAKE kanchi mutt , back dated it-- and then he puts adi shankaracharya a the first shankaracharya of kanchi mutt.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: id=\"bc_0_39b+seedFVFSD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedFVFSD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE GREAT LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA WAS DESTROYED BY ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT &nbsp;TO SINK ALL EVIDENCE OF A KERALA SAGE NAMED APOLLONIUS OF TYANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Serapeum of Alexandria was closed in July of 325 AD, on the orders of Roman Emperor Constantine the Great..., the Serapeum was the largest and most magnificent of all temples in the Greek quarter of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Besides the image of the god, the temple precinct housed an offshoot collection of the great Library of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">UNKNOWN TO ALL A BIG SECTION OF THE LIBRARY WAS UNDERGROUND IN A SUBTERRANEAN VAULT--AND MANY BOOKS ABOUT APOLLONIUS OF TYANA WERE RESCUED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Later a decree of Coptic Christian pope Theophilus of Alexandria in AD 391 called for all rescued books to be hunted down and burned<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Hindu Manichaeans were burnt alive along with their Hindu scriptures and books on Apollonius of Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Thousands of followers of Apollonius of Tyna were put to death \u2013and lot of the survivors came running to Calicut by ship \u2013 they were NOT Jews\u2014 they were Hindus , a sect named MANICHAEANS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Even today Christian In Kerala call each other CHAENS . ( chayyan )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">EVIL CYRIL WAS SAINTED LIKE EVIL MOTHER TERESA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Namboodiri woman mathematician Hypatia would be murdered by a Christian mob in an revenge assault instigated by Cyril, the bishop's nephew and successor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With her death, the glory of Alexandria finally was extinguished.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hypatia was on deputation to the Alexandia school of Math , the wife of a Namboodiri Astronomer / Ayurveda professor, from the Kodungallur University , owned by the Calicut King ( my hometown )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia&nbsp;&nbsp;was pulled down from her chariot, and dragged naked through the streets. ( IN THE LINK BELOW I HAVE SHOWN THE PAINTING )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Her father Theon was a professor in Geometry and Math. The University of Alexandria was headed by a Namboodiri professor named Orestes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The great Library of Alexandria had a million books on its shelves containing Pagan knowledge . As a professor at the university, Hypatia and her father Theon were always inside this library.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia's death ( hacked into pieces on the streets ) is a watershed mark in history delineating the classical age of Hindu paganism from the age of Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cyril was made Pope or Patriarch of Alexandria on 18 October 412<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia was a beautiful woman who would wear a sari -- the pieces of her body, carried around by the Christian mob through the streets of Alexandria, are finally burned together with her books in a place called Cynaron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">IN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE A PICTURE OF HYPATHIA ( MATH PROFESSOR ON DEPUTATION FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY --LIKE HER MATH PROFESSOR FATHER THEON ) TEACHING AT THE UNIVERSITY OF ALEXANDRIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE POPE SANK ALL REFERENCES TO HYPATIA .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">WHY WAS THE GREAT LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA BURNT?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">TO SINK APOLLONIUS OF TYANA --&nbsp;&nbsp;A KERALA SAGE WHO WAS BEING WORSHIPED AS GOD..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HE WAS A SPIRITUAL ANCHOR FOR ROMANS WHO WENT THROUGH TEN DESPOT ROMAN EMPERORS IN HIS LIFETIME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE COLOSSEUM OF ROME ( CONSTRUCTED ON TOP OF A DRIED UP LAKE ) WAS NOT MADE FOR BLOODSPORT.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IT WAS MADE FOR HEARING THE SPEECHES OF APOLLONIUS OF TYANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE ITALIAN WAITRESS AND HER HALF BREED CHILDREN DO NOT conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. If the brain had to rely solely on the visible light spectrum that was reflected off the external object and onto the retina of the eyes, the object would appear two dimensional just as it would be if a picture of the object was recorded photographically with a camera.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Contrary to the popular opinion that we see objects in three dimensions entirely because of binocular vision, just close one eye and observe an external object with the remaining open eye. The object appears \"out there\" and not as an image \"in the brain\" because of PCAR. This clearly presents a survival advantage to an organism allowing it to accurately see and locate objects (especially predators and food) in three dimensional space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">ANIMALS CANY PASS THE COLOUR AND MIRROR TEST EXCEPT A HANDFUL OF CONCIOUS MAMMALS LIKE DOLPHIN, ELEPHANT, BONOBOS ETC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Max Planck knew Sanskrit and read the Vedas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Max Planck, ( founder of Quantum theory ) wrote the \u201cPlanck postulate\u201d, that electromagnetic energy could be emitted or absorbed only in discrete quanta which formed the basis of the description of black body radiation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">This was ultimately extended and used to describe how all matter absorbs and reemits photons (quanta of energy) from and into the quantum foam of the zero point field ( AKASHA that pervades all matter and even the vacuum of space..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Normally these emissions are random exchanges of energy between particles and the ZPF. However, the emissions from complex matter (e.g. living organisms) have been shown to exhibit quantum coherence and also carry information non-locally. Recall that the quantum phenomena of non-locality implies instantaneous transmission of information across space and time<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Quantum Hologram is a model of how reality works. Like all models it enables us to make predictions and create interpretations about how nature operates<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Every one of our cells contains the same genetic blueprint of DNA and clearly that DNA and environmental influences exert major influences over the development and functioning of our cells. But cells are not only subordinate to DNA; they also function and maintain homeostasis by communicating and cooperating simultaneously with many other cells of the body and by the information they receive from the environment. Much of this inter-cellular signaling is electrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With up to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that many cells can remain in harmony by the slow process of electrochemical signaling especially under times of great distress when survival of the entire organism is at stake and / or requires extremely rapid and coordinated responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Epigenetics which is the study of the mechanisms by which the environment influences cells and their offspring without changing genetic codes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inter-cellular communication is especially critical in embryonic development. From a single fertilized egg, the embryo divides thousands of times and each time producing identical offspring cells called stem cells. Then at some critical point when the embryo has reached a certain size, something truly miraculous happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cells begin to differentiate and form groups of like cells that will eventually become all the highly specialized tissues and organs that make up the human body. Out of the entire mass of undifferentiated cells making up the embryo, how does a particular stem cell suddenly know that it is to transform into a heart cell, liver cell, neuron, etc?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Clearly, some of the differentiation results from electrochemical signaling with the immediate surrounding cells. This exchange is certainly necessary and provides information about how a cell must change to express itself correctly to become the right type of cell at the right place and at the right time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">In higher organisms with brains, the massively parallel processing capabilities of the brain structures are capable of simultaneously resonating with QUANTUM HOLOGRAM information at an incredible range of frequencies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">AKASHIK RECORD of Vedas described as an all pervasive foundation that contains not only all knowledge of the human experience but also the entire history of the universe. There is no such thing as independent action. Everything is defined in relationship to everything else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Learning - Experience is retained in nature\u2019s memory, the Quantum Hologram. FAKE DASAS AND PAINTED BY THIS CRYPTO JEW RAJA RAVI VARMA<br />\nWE NEVER HEARD OF THE FOUL AND FAKE STORIES IN THE LINKS BELOW TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA<br />\n<br Purvachitti, Sahajanya, Karnika, Punjikasthala, Viswachi, Rithisthala, Umlocha, Pramlocha, Swayamprabha, Janapadi, Adrika, Dandagauri , Varuthini , Gopali ,Kumbhayoni, Prajagara , Chitrasena, Chitralekha , Saha, Madhuraswana etc \u2013 WHO SEDUCED MAHARISHIS AND SCREWED THEM \u2013ARE FOUL LIES INJECTED INTO OUR VEDAS AND PURANAS<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS NO PROSTITUTION IN INDIA TILL THE ISLAMIC INVADER CAME TO INDIA. EMPEROR JEHANGIRs HAREM HAD 6000 WHORES<br />\n<br />\nSonagachi in Kolkata, Kamathipura in Mumbai, G.B. Road in New Delhi , Budhwar Peth in Pune were all whorehouses ( holding devadasis \u2013handmaidens of God ) created by Jew Rothschild for his white troops.<br />\n<br />\nThere were more than 3.8 lakhs ( 380,000 ) military prostitutes in the Lal Bazaars<br />\n<br />\nPROSTITUTION MAY HAVE BEEN THE OLDEST PROFESSION ON THIS PLANET-BUT IT DID NOT EXIST IN INDIA , THE LAND OF SPIRITUALITY<br />\n<br />\nWhen the bronze figure of a dancing girl was unearthed at Mohenjodaro , immediately the white man branded her as a \u201csacred prostitute\u201d<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_149BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Here\nis one such cock and bull letter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"\nHail, my dearest Paul ... so great a man, so beloved in all ways ... You are\nthe summit and topmost peak of all people ...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We\nwere much refreshed by the reading of ... the many letters which you have\naddressed to some city or capital of a province .. which inculcate the moral\nlife with admirable precepts...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Such\nis the greatness of them ... such nobility, that I think whole ages of men\ncould hardly suffice for the instilling and perfecting of them ... For it is\nthe holy spirit which is in you and high above you which expresses these\nexalted and adorable thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\nAugustus was moved by your views ... he could wonder that a man not regularly\neducated could think thus. I replied that the gods often speak by the mouths of\nthe simple ...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Be but\nintimately associated with me and my name ...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am\nglad as to be counted a second self of yours ... For the rank that is mine, I\nwould it were yours, and yours I would were mine.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Sirius (Mrgavyadha \"deer hunter ) rises just before the Sun on the morning of June 19th, exactly 365 days, 6 hours, 9 minutes, and 9.54 seconds after its last rising.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The abused include boys\nand girls, some as young as 3 years old, with the majority between the ages of\n11 and 14. &nbsp;&nbsp;Cases have also been brought\nagainst members of the Catholic hierarchy who covered up sex abuse allegations,\nmoving allegedly abusive priests to other parishes, where abuse sometimes\ncontinued.[5][6]</span>&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 2001 to 2010 the Holy See, the\ncentral governing body of the Catholic Church, considered sex abuse allegations\nconcerning about 3,000 priests dating back up to fifty years.[11] Cases\nworldwide reflect patterns of long-term abuse and of the church hierarchy\nregularly covering up reports of alleged abuse.[note 1]&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diocesan officials and\nacademics knowledgeable about the Roman Catholic Church say that sexual abuse\nby clergy is generally not discussed, and thus is difficult to measure.[12][13]\nIn the Philippines, where as of 2002 at least 85% of the population is\nCatholic, revelations of child sexual abuse by priests followed the United\nStates' reporting in 2002.[14]&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2004, the John Jay report tabulated a total\nof 4,392 priests and deacons in the U.S. against whom allegations of sexual\nabuse had been made.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Republic of Ireland, starting in\nthe 1990s, a series of criminal cases and government enquiries related to\nallegations that priests had abused hundreds of minors over previous decades.\nState-ordered investigations documented \"tens of thousands of children\nfrom the 1940s to the 1990s\" who suffered abuse, including sexual abuse at\nthe hands of priests, nuns, and church staff in three diocese.[72]</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2004 John Jay Report was based on a study of 10,667 allegations against\n4,392 priests accused of engaging in sexual abuse of a minor between 1950 and\n2002.[101]</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The report stated there were approximately 10,667\nreported victims (younger than 18 years) of clergy sexual abuse between 1950 and\n2002:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>Around 81% of these\nvictims were male.<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Female victims of\nsexual abuse by Catholic priests tended to be younger than the males. Data\nanalyzed by John Jay researchers, shows that the number and proportion of\nsexual misconduct directed at girls under 8 years old was higher than that\ndirected at boys the same age.[102]</span>&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 38.4% of\nallegations, the abuse is alleged to have occurred within a single year, in\n21.8% the alleged abuse lasted more than a year but less than 2 years, in 28%\nbetween 2 and 4 years, in 10.2% between 5 and 9 years and, in under 1%, 10 or\nmore years.</span>&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mark Honigsbaum of The Guardian wrote in 2006 that,\n\"despite the National Review Board's own estimates that there have been\nsome 5,000 abusive priests in the US, to date 150 have been successfully\nprosecuted.\"</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In September 2010, Pope Benedict XVI\nlamented that the Roman Catholic Church had not been vigilant enough or quick\nenough in responding to the problem of sexual abuse by Catholic clergy.[209]&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pope Benedict laicized 400 priests for abuses in two years of his papacy.[3]</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As\nreported by the Boston Globe, some bishops had facilitated compensation\npayments to victims on condition that the allegations remained secret.[220] For\nexample, according to the Boston Globe, the Archdiocese of Boston secretly\nsettled child sexual abuse claims against at least 70 priests from 1992 to\n2002.[220]</span>&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2010, Christopher Hitchens and Richard\nDawkins wanted to prosecute the Pope for crimes against humanity due to what\nthey see as his role in intentionally covering up abuse by priests.[221][222]\nIn April 2010, a lawsuit was filed in the Milwaukee Federal Court by an\nanonymous \"John Doe 16\" against the Vatican and Pope Benedict XVI.\nThe plaintiff accused Ratzinger and others of having covered up abuse cases to\navoid scandal to the detriment of the concerned children.[224]&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In February\n2011, two German lawyers initiated charges against Pope Benedict XVI at the\nInternational Criminal Court. As one of the reasons for the charges they\nreferred also to the \"strong suspicion\" that Joseph Ratzinger, as\nhead of the Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith, covered up the sexual\nabuse of children and youths and protected the perpetrators.[225]</span>&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vatican\nofficials have expressed concern that the church's insistence on\nconfidentiality in its treatment of priestly sexual abuse cases was seen as a\nban on reporting serious accusations to the civil authorities. Early in 2010\nCardinal Claudio Hummes, the head of the Congregation for Clergy, finally said\nthat instances of sexual abuse by priests were \"criminal facts\" as\nwell as serious sins and required co-operation with the civil justice system.&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Italian academic Lucetta Scaraffia (it) described the conspiracy involved in\nhiding the offence as omerta, the Mafia code of silence, and said that \"We\ncan hypothesise that a greater female presence, not at a subordinate level,\nwould have been able to rip the veil of masculine secrecy that in the past\noften covered the denunciation of these misdeeds with silence\".[233]</span>&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><i><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">The\nUnited Nations Committee on the Rights of the Child, in early 2014, issued a\nreport asserting that the pope and the Roman Catholic Church have not done\nenough and protect their reputation rather than protect children.[240]</span>&nbsp;</b></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According\nto the John-Jay-Report, 80.9% of the abuse victims in the United States were\nmale;[105] and a study by Dr. Thomas Plante found the number may be as high as\n90%.[265]&nbsp;</span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><i><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">A number of books, such as \"The Rite of Sodomy: Homosexuality\nand the Roman Catholic Church\", have argued that homosexual priests view\nsex with minors as a \"rite of passage\" for altar boys and other\npre-adult males.[266]</span>&nbsp;</b></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>William Donohue of the Catholic League\nargued that the Church's p\u00e6dophile problem was really a \"homosexual\ncrisis\",[267]&nbsp;</i></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i>In the United States Father Cozzens quoted figures from 23\npercent to 58 percent of homosexual priests, with a higher percentage among\nyounger priests.[268]UNQUOTE</i></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catholic_Church_sexual_abuse_cases%23cite_note-268\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catholic_Church_sexual_abuse_cases#cite_note-268</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE FIRST 32 POPES IN THE LIST BELOW ARE ALL\nCOOKED UP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">POPE NO 33 SYLVESTER 1 WAS MADE FAMOUS BY\nRAPHAEL\u2019S PAINTING OF THE BAPTSIM FOR ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT ON\nHIS DEATH BED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE TRUTH IS CONSTANTINE THE GREAT WAS\nBAPTISED AFTER HE WAS DEAD ,ON 22<sup>ND</sup> MAY 33 AD BY AN ARIAN BISHOP ,&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;EUSEBIUS OF NICOMEDIA&nbsp;&nbsp; , WHO WAS RELATED BY BLOOD TO EMPEROR CONSTANTINE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HENCE PEOPLE BELIEVED HIS LIE THAT\nCONSTANTINE WAS ALIVE , &nbsp;WHEN BAPTISED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantine has made sure that he would be\npresent at the First Ecumenical Council of Nicaea, 325 AD , to carry out his\nagenda of creating MESSIAH JESUS CHRIST and SINK Apollonius for ever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EUSEBIUS OF NICOMEDIA WAS ACTUALLY A POLITICIAN\nIN BISHOPs GARB--&nbsp; A \u201cFAKE GURU\u201d OF THOSE\nDAYS, WHOM THE EMPEROR USED TO GRAB POWER. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EUSEBUIS USED FORCE AND MURDER TO MAKE SURE\nNOBODY OPPOSED HIM , AND ALL WERE AFRAID OF HIM. ESPECIALLY SO\nBECAUSE CONSTANTINE THE GREAT CONSTANTLY REFERRED TO EUSEBIUS AS A \u201cMAN OF GOD\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EUSEBIUS CONVERTED THE HEATHEN VISIGOTHS TO\nCHRISTINAITY BY BRIBING THEIR LEADERS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">VISIGOTHS WOULD LATER BE USED AS GOONDAS TO\nKILL DRUIDS&nbsp; ALL OVER EUROPE AND TO SMASH\nALL PAGAN TEMPLES IN ROME.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qUMTe-wAiOA/VwJv2UPXoEI/AAAAAAABHBc/PDguLSeBHlQ1fWiHDu73TjspHyXmgp4FQ/s1600/12viFVVsigoth1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SATYA VACHCHAN <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DATE 4<sup>TH</sup> APRIL 2016<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TIME: 1855 IST.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Eusebius of Nicomedia was also the bishop who\nordained another FAKE BISHOP Ulfilas (Wulfila ) as the apostle of the Goths and\nthus was the key person in directing these people towards Arian Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">POOR WIKIPEDIA !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">POOR ROTHSCHILD !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1h2-vj8VSCs/VwKFH1rJPgI/AAAAAAABHCg/wrHNIB8w9LMHzTGfcryoG9Vo-NMi3Hvkw/s1600/product_thTTumbnail.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1h2-vj8VSCs/VwKFH1rJPgI/AAAAAAABHCg/wrHNIB8w9LMHzTGfcryoG9Vo-NMi3Hvkw/s400/product_thTTumbnail.jpg\" width=\"267\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;&nbsp; I wish to make a statement for those who may\nthink that I am an ignorant protestant who knows nothing about the Catholic\nChurch. I have received numerous e-mails by indignant Catholics who think I\ndon't know anything about what I am writing about and putting on this site.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First of all, I am old\nenough to be able to say that I attended Mass for years in LATIN! Not English\nas most today! I am quite familiar with all the Catholic doctrines, traditions\nand rituals, from the rosary, the stations of the cross, praying to Mary the\nMediatrix to not eating meat on Friday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moreover, I grew up in\nSan Antonio, Texas, living about 6 blocks from a large Catholic Church that was\nonce a Cloistered Convent. Most today don't know about them. My step-father was\nan altar boy at the church, planning to go into the priesthood, until the\ngovernment forced that Convent to open up.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then they found the bones of babies\nunder the floor that came from the sex escapades of the priests (who represent\nChrist) and the nuns (who were 'married to christ'), which was supposed to mean\nthat when the nun had sex with the priest, they were having sex with Christ and\nit was not sin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a priest came wanting a young nun, the Mother Superior\nlined them up for the priest to pick out his victim of the day.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They then went\ninto a private room with a bed and he got what he didn't get at home, since\npriests are not allowed to marry. This is one of the greatest errors of the\nCatholic Church and violations of the Word of God and is the source of all the\naffairs with women (many times with one who came to the confessional and was\nforced into the abomination called auricular confession) or homosexual\nencounters you have read about in the papers over the years.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And they have only\ntouched the tip of the iceberg of the sexual perversion within the priesthood\n(and these men are supposed to be 'men of God')? When a baby was born, the\nMother Superior would suffocate the baby and bury it within the Convent. Now to\nthe sex sin is added the sin of murder! All for the sexual pleasures and\nfulfillment of the lusts of the priests. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I personally met a dear\nnun who was enslaved within a cloistered convent in the United States. She\nmanaged a daring escape and ran for her life, then began to speak out and was a\npart of the governments finally forcing them to be opened and stop the terrible\nfarce of religious piety and holiness behind those walls (she testified before\nCongress).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as she escaped and begin to speak out so that the other\nenslaved nuns being held against their will might be set free, (for to enter\nthe convent was to be sealed within it's walls until death without ever being\nable to leave), they began trying to murder her.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While in the convent, all mail\nwas checked and censored and there were no outside contacts allowed. They were\nslaves to Rome! Not bringing Glory to God! But of course the poor little nuns\ndidn't know what awaited them once they entered those walls because of the\nlies, hypocrisy and cover-ups of the church.UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Edith\nO\u2019Gorman&nbsp; who spoke to thousands in\nWashington, D.C. in March 1928.&nbsp; --&nbsp; (Sister Teresa de Chantal, of St. Joseph's\nConvent, Hudson City, N.J.)<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e_yEAUWqZ-A/VwKIsERuSDI/AAAAAAABHCs/NXT59o6oS44DBSYS8dgKmkjGj9GFZgzZg/s1600/VGGdownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e_yEAUWqZ-A/VwKIsERuSDI/AAAAAAABHCs/NXT59o6oS44DBSYS8dgKmkjGj9GFZgzZg/s640/VGGdownload.jpg\" width=\"463\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/H5TyNPG88aU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/H5TyNPG88aU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testimony of Sister\nCharlotte &nbsp;about abuses in convents.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She left her home in\nthe USA for a convent overseas in 1910, and later escaped.&nbsp; Afterwards she accepted Christ and began\ngiving her testimony, from which the following excerpt is taken:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp; I saw scores of babies born in the\nconvents. Most were abnormal and deformed and seldom was one normal. With my\nhands I have delivered many, many of them, therefore I know. With my eyes I\nhave seen the horror of it all and the world must be told of what goes on in\nthose chambers of horrors.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Many have said I\nexaggerate and that these things are not so, but I have yet to be hauled into\ncourt to refute the charges. They would have to open the cloisters and this\nthey dare not do. After being snared in this rotten system for twenty-two\nyears, I know whereof I speak.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Normal young expectant\nmothers eagerly anticipate the arrival of their precious baby. Everything is\nready, nursery, crib, clothing, and everyone is happy with her. By contrast, a\nlittle nun in the convent dreads the moment when she gives birth. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The child is the\nproduct of a shameful, illicit union with a drunken priest which was forced on\nher. She knows from bitter experience that the baby will only be permitted to\nlive four or five hours at the very most. It will never be cleaned or wrapped\nin a warm blanket for Mother Superior will put her hand over its mouth and\npinch its nostrils to snuff out its life.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">This is why there are\nlime pits in all the convents. Babies' bodies are tossed in these holes to be\ndestroyed. Pray for the government to force the convents to open their doors to\nrelease the prisoners and let the whole world see what horrors are hidden behind\nthose doors of cruel religious hypocrisy.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">If this happens, I\nassure you that even the Catholic people will agree to the closing of the\nconvents as they did in Mexico in 1934. They have no idea what is transpiring\nthere either, or they would never expose their daughters to such barbarous\ndebauchery and torture.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The convents in old\nMexico have been turned into government museums which you can tour for a modest\nfee. You should go and see with your own eyes and touch with your hands the\nthings of which I speak.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Go down into the dungeons, through the tunnels\nand torture chambers and see all the fiendish devices, demonically conceived,\nto inflict suffering on the bodies of helpless nuns. See for yourself the cells\nin which nuns were locked each night and examine the beds, and the prayer\nboards&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">:UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Convents were banned in\nMexico in 1857, but one, the Convento de Santa Monica, continued to operate\nsecretly until it was discovered in 1934 and abolished.&nbsp; It is now a museum.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sister_Abhaya_murder_case\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sister_Abhaya_murder_case</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
