, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Above: Seneca and Nero</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANY SCHOLARS\nQUESTIONED \u2013 WHY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">EMBARRASSED</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;VATICAN-&nbsp; THE HOLY POPES GOT CAUGHT WITH THEIR ROBES DOWN .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO THEY COOKED UP FRIENDLY\nLETTERS FROM MIGHTY SENECA JR ( WHO HAD ROMAN EMPERORS ON HIS FINGER TIPS ) TO ST\nPAUL THE DISCIPLE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is one such cock\nand bull letter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" Hail, my dearest\nPaul ... so great a man, so beloved in all ways ... You are the summit and\ntopmost peak of all people ...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We were much refreshed\nby the reading of ... the many letters which you have addressed to some city or\ncapital of a province .. which inculcate the moral life with admirable\nprecepts...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Such is the greatness\nof them ... such nobility, that I think whole ages of men could hardly suffice\nfor the instilling and perfecting of them ... For it is the holy spirit which\nis in you and high above you which expresses these exalted and adorable\nthoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Augustus was moved\nby your views ... he could wonder that a man not regularly educated could think\nthus. I replied that the gods often speak by the mouths of the simple ...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Be but intimately\nassociated with me and my name ...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I am glad as to be\ncounted a second self of yours ... For the rank that is mine, I would it were\nyours, and yours I would were mine.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Farewell, dearest\nPaul.\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AIYOOOOOOOOOO !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1320591579178827055\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_152M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. in 1682 the marriage was annulled on the ground that Howard was in fact Amy Poulter, a 'perfect woman in all her parts', and two women could not validly marry<br />\n<br />\nThe homosexual problem in Britain is so DEEP ROOTED that in a 2004 poll by Gallup reported that 52% agreed that 'marriages between homosexuals' should be recognised while 45% said they should not.<br />\n<br />\nHomosexuality in Britain is increasing--<br />\n<br />\nAn opinion poll conducted in June 2009 by Populus for The Times reported 61% of the British public agreed with the statement 'Gay couples should have an equal right to get married'<br />\n<br />\nA poll conducted by Angus Reid in July 2010 showed that 78% of people supported either same-sex marriage .<br />\n<br />\nA June 2012 YouGov survey shows that 71% are in favour of same-sex marriage<br />\n<br />\nThe 2015 Eurobarometer found that 71% of Britons thought that same-sex marriage should be allowed throughout Europe.<br />\n<br />\nWE IN INDIA DO NT HAVE A HOMOSEXUAL PROBLEM--OUR \"PERCENTAGE\" IS LEAST ON THE PLANET<br />\n<br />\nWHENEVER THE BENAMI INDIA MEDIA CONDUCTS A HOMOSEXUAL POLL-- THE WHOLE WORLDs HOMOSEXUALS PARTICIPATES ( AS IF THEY ARE INDIANS )..<br />\n<br />\nTwo of the most famous studies of the demographics of human sexual orientation were PERVERT Dr. Alfred Kinsey's Sexual Behavior in the Human Male (1948) and Sexual Behavior in the Human Female (1953).<br />\n<br />\nThese studies used a seven-point spectrum to define sexual behavior, from 0 for completely heterosexual to 6 for completely homosexual. Kinsey concluded that a small percentage of the population were to one degree or another bisexual (falling on the scale from 1 to 6). , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">William Craig\u2019s 1972\nbook Enemy at the Gates: The Battle of Stalingrad (p. 347): <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">In Susdal Felice Bracci\nsuddenly discovered corpses missing arms or legs, and Dr. Capone found human\nheads from which the brain had been extracted, as well as bodies missing the\nkidneys or the liver. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Cannibalism was\nspreading. At first the cannibals were still shy; they crept up to the corpses\nat night, hacked off a member here and there and devoured the flesh raw. But\ntheir abandon quickly grew, and soon they were looking for deceased who had not\nyet grown cold and were therefore supposedly more eatable.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;Finally they operated in groups breaking all\nresistance and even \"helping out\" the dying. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pagan Romans had\naccused Christians of cannibalism both in reality and by ritual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Roman pagans said -- If\nCatholics believe the Eucharist really is the body and blood of Christ, then\nthey believe they are eating human flesh and drinking human blood.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pZ-wRLLqDpQ/VwFe9RryGKI/AAAAAAABHAo/oRdKCy-GdlI61WikqVdVR-XVkdIKYtv_g/s1600/779641f8_orig.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pZ-wRLLqDpQ/VwFe9RryGKI/AAAAAAABHAo/oRdKCy-GdlI61WikqVdVR-XVkdIKYtv_g/s400/779641f8_orig.jpg\" width=\"287\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Eucharist &nbsp;(also called Holy Communion, the Lord's Supper)\nis a rite considered by most Christian churches to be a sacrament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the NEW\nTestament, it was instituted by Jesus Christ during his Last Supper. Giving his\ndisciples bread and wine during the Passover meal, Jesus commanded his\nfollowers to \"do this in memory of me\" while referring to the bread\nas \"my body\" and the wine as \"my blood\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How many Christians\nwant to sip from &nbsp;a common communion cup?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No problem?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fZM4vxKM-EA/VwFhj2hdg9I/AAAAAAABHA8/1gBliVfCpaUw3cOTEueh4-2wkbQFYA62A/s1600/thf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"430\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fZM4vxKM-EA/VwFhj2hdg9I/AAAAAAABHA8/1gBliVfCpaUw3cOTEueh4-2wkbQFYA62A/s640/thf.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then would you drink\nfrom any another cup half filled with water , where hundreds have sipped ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intinction (dipping the\nbread in the wine) is in use in many Episcopal Church parishes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why did you not try it\n?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nQUOTE :&nbsp; <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Even if they\nneeded to drink water somebody from a higher caste would have to pour that\nwater from a height as they were not allowed to touch either the water or the\nvessel that contained it. This task was usually performed for the young\nAmbedkar by the school peon, and if he could not be found Ambedkar went without\nwater</span></i>: UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n4<sup>TH</sup> PARA of post below-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><a href=\"http://www.bspindia.org/bhimrao-ambedkar.php\">http://www.bspindia.org/bhimrao-ambedkar.php</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5233812580207356281\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_180M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/11928416670803134384\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Sehaj</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_30.html?showComment=1459706866196#c5233812580207356281\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">April 3, 2016 at 11:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_180MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt,<br />\n<br />\nAs you said, anal sex receiving party can become cannibalistic. We write exams . Our ships have to last in stormy seas.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">This bridge below shows POOR DESIGN , POOR WORKSMANSHIP ( at the curve ) and LESSER SCANTLINGS &nbsp;where more thickness of steel beams is requires.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">ACT OF GOD my ass.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">In Japan ships are delivered in 3 months from keel laying ceremony-- to captain and crew receiving delivery of ship and taking off.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">I had the misfortune of commanding a CALCUTTA GARDEN REACH built ship , which SCI inherited from MOGHUL LINES named LOK PRAGATI. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">This SHIT fuckin' &nbsp;SHIP took 16 long years to build and the ship was delivered rusty and with cockroaches ( commie rule ). &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">Out of curiosity I crawled around the whole bong built ship -- VERY POOR DESIGN and VERY POOR WORKSMANSHIP .</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">.</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KUmbIRX_VKY/Vv5r_vSWAnI/AAAAAAABG9Q/YM8TFQmhcDsX8I3H7fShzBTQcwGGywMvA/s1600/32B759C200000578-3518104-image-a-3_145e9461280032.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KUmbIRX_VKY/Vv5r_vSWAnI/AAAAAAABG9Q/YM8TFQmhcDsX8I3H7fShzBTQcwGGywMvA/s640/32B759C200000578-3518104-image-a-3_145e9461280032.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></span></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">There were cracks at\nsensitive areas , and I got it done up wherever I could.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I remember one time, we\nwere at Paradip ( Orissa ) and I felt some cracks had to be done up. So I\ncalled skilled welders from Orissa area , examined their expertise and rejected\nall of them.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Then I called fro welders from Calcutta, half a dozen came , and I\nchose only one \u2013sent back the remaining.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The SCI tech suptd a Parsi Captain came on board from Mumbai to Paradip \u2014to\nsort of tell me Captain what the fuck do you know.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">He was trying to select some more welders to\nexpedite \u2013and I said NO!.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">And I got the ship\nshifted to a idle berth which costs money. There was water ingress in hold No 1\niron ore at Japan. I quietly went down , tasted the water and found it was salt\nsea water. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">My wife and elder son\nwas on board. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The job was to arrest\ncranks ( like spider )at the extremities by drilling holes\u2014GOUGE the cracks and\nweld , bevel it and weld. The Tech Parsi boss was interfering and asking me to\njust weld over without arresting the cracks.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I said NO\u2014the work will\nbe done my way, with proper rest hours given to the welder from Calcutta.&nbsp; That Bong welder , man did NOT even have\nshoes \u2013I had to give it.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN BETWEEN ME AND MY\nSHORE BOSS HAD AN ARGUMENT OVER REST HOURS FOR THE WELDER.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HE SAID \u201c CAPTAIN , I\nWILL FIX YOU \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SO I SAID \u2013 \u201c PLEASE COME\nTO MY CABIN , I WANT TO SHOW YOU SOMETHING BEFORE YOU FIX ME \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I GAVE HIM A BLUE COLOURED\nFILE TO READ . &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IT WAS MY SECRET CORRESPONDENCE WITH SCI CHAIRMEN OVER POLICY MATTERS\n.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE PARSI CAPTAINS FACE\nBECAME PALE WHITE LIKE A SHEET. HIS BLOOD DRAINED OUT.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE SAID &nbsp; &nbsp;\u201c AJIT, &nbsp;YAAR , I WITHDRAW MY THREAT. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;PLEASE DO WHAT YOU\nWANT\u2014YOUR WAY. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN SCI , I CANNOT EVEN GET INTO THE CHAIRMAINs LIFT &nbsp;OR BUILDING FLOOR &nbsp;( IT WAS A 23 STOREY BUILDING ) AND HERE YOU\nARE AS A ORDINARY CAPTAIN&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">CORRESPONDING</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;WITH THEM ALL OF THEM BY LETTER, &nbsp;AS IF THEY ARE YOUR LANGOT YAAR FRIENDS\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;I REPLIED &nbsp; \u201d THIS SHIT SHIP HAS TO BE INSPECTED\nALL OVER, AND CRACKED AREAS AT THE BOWS MUST BE REPAIRED PROPERLY \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HE PROMISED \u201cYES\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I GOT OFF THE NEXT\nVOYAGE<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">A COUPLE OF YEARS LATER\nTHIS BONG &nbsp;MADE SHIP MV LOK PRAGATI NEARLY SANK.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HE IS THE REPORT BELOW\n--<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">#####################<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><a href=\"http://www.shipsnostalgia.com/showthread.php?t=18593\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://www.shipsnostalgia.com/showthread.php?t=18593</a><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">2000-July 22 <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Bulker LOK PRAGATI,\n(India, 16040 grt, built 1984) sent distress message owing to forecastle damage\nand water ingress shortly after sailing Port Elisabeth RSA. She had to call\nCape Town for repair.[Structural]<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">###########################<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE INTERNATIONAL MARITIME\nWORLD BOSSES HAVE KEPT THE BULK CARRIER LOSSES A SECRET\u2014 &nbsp;MORE THAN 400 HUGE\nSHIPS SANK WITH CREW IN THE SEVENTIES DUE TO LESSER STEEL SCANTLINGS ( FOR SHIP BUILDING ECONOMY ) .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">BUT IF A BEER IS SPILT\nON AN AIR CRAFT PASSENGER, IT WOULD BECOME COVER PAGE NEWS ON TIME / NEWSWEEK AND PRIME TIME TV.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE MARITIME CUNTS DID\nNOT EVEN KNOW HOW TO TIE A LIFE RAFT PROPERLY\u2014TILL I PUT MY FOOT DOWN AND THREW\nSHIT ON IMO, OIL MAJOR VETTING AGENCIES, &nbsp;PORT STATE CONTROL ETC.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS I WHO ADDRESSED\nTHE&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">UNKNOWN</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;PROBLEM OF \u201cMINIMUM BOW HEIGHT\u201d TO BE INCLUDED IN SHIPs STABILITY BOOK, &nbsp; &nbsp;AND THE&nbsp;TRUTH THAT THE \u201cSTRONG\nPOINT\u201d OF A LIFE RAFT IS THE HRU (HYDROSTATIC RELEASE UNIT) ITSELF AND NOT THE SHIPs\nHULL.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I WENT AROUND MARITIME\nTRAINING INSTITUTIONS ALL OVER INDIA AND MADE THEM CORRECT THEIR TRAINING POSTERS\n&nbsp;AND BOOKS ABOUT \"STRONG POINT\" BEING THE HRU &nbsp;ITSELF AND NOT THE SHIP. .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/snow-shovelling-and-backache-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>SEA IS A PLACE FOR MINDLESS CUNTS !</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nI STARTED ON MY <b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">NAIVE SAILOR SERIES&nbsp;</span></b>--<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN I WOUND UP-- <br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE USE ?<br />\n<br />\nTEACH DONKEYS TO SING ?<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/gROO7xSTxfY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/gROO7xSTxfY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE GREAT LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA WAS DESTROYED BY ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTINE THE GREAT &nbsp;TO SINK ALL EVIDENCE OF A KERALA SAGE NAMED APOLLONIUS OF TYANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Serapeum of Alexandria was closed in July of 325 AD, on the orders of Roman Emperor Constantine the Great..., the Serapeum was the largest and most magnificent of all temples in the Greek quarter of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Besides the image of the god, the temple precinct housed an offshoot collection of the great Library of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">UNKNOWN TO ALL A BIG SECTION OF THE LIBRARY WAS UNDERGROUND IN A SUBTERRANEAN VAULT--AND MANY BOOKS ABOUT APOLLONIUS OF TYANA WERE RESCUED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Later a decree of Coptic Christian pope Theophilus of Alexandria in AD 391 called for all rescued books to be hunted down and burned<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Hindu Manichaeans were burnt alive along with their Hindu scriptures and books on Apollonius of Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Thousands of followers of Apollonius of Tyna were put to death \u2013and lot of the survivors came running to Calicut by ship \u2013 they were NOT Jews\u2014 they were Hindus , a sect named MANICHAEANS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Even today Christian In Kerala call each other CHAENS . ( chayyan )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">EVIL CYRIL WAS SAINTED LIKE EVIL MOTHER TERESA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Namboodiri woman mathematician Hypatia would be murdered by a Christian mob in an revenge assault instigated by Cyril, the bishop's nephew and successor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With her death, the glory of Alexandria finally was extinguished.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hypatia was on deputation to the Alexandia school of Math , the wife of a Namboodiri Astronomer / Ayurveda professor, from the Kodungallur University , owned by the Calicut King ( my hometown )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia&nbsp;&nbsp;was pulled down from her chariot, and dragged naked through the streets. ( IN THE LINK BELOW I HAVE SHOWN THE PAINTING )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Her father Theon was a professor in Geometry and Math. The University of Alexandria was headed by a Namboodiri professor named Orestes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The great Library of Alexandria had a million books on its shelves containing Pagan knowledge . As a professor at the university, Hypatia and her father Theon were always inside this library.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia's death ( hacked into pieces on the streets ) is a watershed mark in history delineating the classical age of Hindu paganism from the age of Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cyril was made Pope or Patriarch of Alexandria on 18 October 412<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia was a beautiful woman who would wear a sari -- the pieces of her body, carried around by the Christian mob through the streets of Alexandria, are finally burned together with her books in a place called Cynaron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">IN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE A PICTURE OF HYPATHIA ( MATH PROFESSOR ON DEPUTATION FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY --LIKE HER MATH PROFESSOR FATHER THEON ) TEACHING AT THE UNIVERSITY OF ALEXANDRIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE POPE SANK ALL REFERENCES TO HYPATIA .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">WHY WAS THE GREAT LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA BURNT?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">TO SINK APOLLONIUS OF TYANA --&nbsp;&nbsp;A KERALA SAGE WHO WAS BEING WORSHIPED AS GOD..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HE WAS A SPIRITUAL ANCHOR FOR ROMANS WHO WENT THROUGH TEN DESPOT ROMAN EMPERORS IN HIS LIFETIME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: TYANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE ITALIAN WAITRESS AND HER HALF BREED CHILDREN DO NOT Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/blockchain-bitcoin-big-brother-will.html?showComment=1513185259860#c4671100578196233665\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 13, 2017 at 10:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_175MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPhysicists in China and the US have built a 10-qubit superconducting quantum processor that could be scaled up to tackle problems not solvable by classical computers.<br />\n<br />\nQubits are the building blocks of quantum computing, capable of superposition \u2013 being in two states at the same time, rather than the computer bits of today, which are either a 1 or a 0 at any given moment.<br />\n<br />\nEntanglement is where quantum states can't be described independently, but only in relation to the others, making for a more solid system. The team used a measurement technique called quantum tomography to prove that they had indeed entangled their qubits<br />\n<br />\nThe phenomenon of entanglement in quantum physics, which has been observed in many experiments, implies that objects that are far removed in space (even across billions of miles) remain connected even though there is no mediating agency.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVedic philosophy tells us about the existence of another type of particle called the atma, the soul, the self, having different properties from those of ordinary particles.This is not unusual in physics, as is the case with antimatter particles.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not come into or out of existence, it is always present. It does not decay or degrade, it maintains its individuality always, it\u2019s infinitesimally small and it\u2019s not composed of more elementary particles. It\u2019s unchangeable, which along with the individuality property implies that it does not unite with other particles to create more complex structures, nor does it merge with others.<br />\n<br />\nThe atma does not interact directly with matter, but given that the atma is the source of consciousness and the life force in a living entity, any entity displaying them reveals the presence of an atma in it\u2014whether human, animal, plant, etc.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta wrote 7000 years ago-- The living entities are not made up of atmas; rather, they are these particles and are animating the material bodies that encase them. As soon as the atma leaves one body for another, the old body no longer exhibits consciousness or life symptoms, and begins to degrade.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMaharishi Kashyapa is also known as Kanada Muni. He called the atom Anu. He wrote that there are 108 such elements ...<br />\n<br />\nThe basic Vaisheshika concepts of matter, action, attribute, time and space are described. The 8500 year old Nyaya-Vaiseshika Sutra of Kanada Muni consists of 373 Sutras and is composed of 12 chapters.<br />\n<br />\nIt\u2019s main postulates are:--<br />\n<br />\nAll of the universe is composed of the 5 mahabhuttas and the 4 non physicals: that is Fluid, Atomic elements, fields/force, energy, ether and space, time, mind and soul.<br />\n<br />\nExcept ether, all of the physical elements are made of discreet and distinct paramanus or atoms<br />\n<br />\nSpace-time is a frame in which the physical universe exists<br />\n<br />\nThere are seven categories of experience, which are substance, quality, activity, generality, particularity, inherence, and nonexistence.<br />\n<br />\nEnergy and mass are equivalent.<br />\n<br />\nHere are some of the Sutras: ---<br />\n<br />\nForce is that which displaces, holds together or moves things apart.V.S 1.1.20<br />\nIn the absence of a force, a particle of matter experiences no change. V.S 1.1.6<br />\nThe forces to be considered are an external force, gravity, that with causes attraction of particles, that which causes repulsion of particles and the internal movements of them in matter.<br />\n<br />\nV.S 1.1.13 Action is opposed by an equivalent opposite reaction<br />\nV.S 5.1.1618 The diversities of the movement of an arrow are due to the consecutive changes in the components of the acting forces. The stored energy provides the propulsion to the arrow and this causes it move further to a high point. This component keeps reducing while that of gravity increases resulting in its fall.Once the work against gravity ceases then the body reaches an energyless state falling under gravity.<br />\nV.S 1.1.27 The force on a body is the resultant of gravity and the work done against it.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_175BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_173T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_173TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_173TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_173B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5923840167230626705\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_173M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nV.S 5.1.13 In the absence of all other forces (saMyogabindings) gravity exists.<br />\nV.S 5.1.7 The \u201cguna\u201d of forces (direction) prevents a magnitude from being obtained<br />\nV.S.1.1.20a The nature of physical changes in matter is the terms of work being done on the basic particles that constitute matter.<br />\nV.S 2.1.14 The particular nature of air is suggested by the mixing of gases that occurs on their collision. Despite of being made of atoms and occupying space air fails show orderly movement so its form cannot be perceived<br />\nV.S 4.1.8 Solids occupy space and assume form due to conglomeration of the constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 4.1.6 The (fluid\u2019s) particles possess energy. This causes them to possess the property of fluidity. The heat bearing rays provide the particles with energy to form a gas and rise. The heated particles of air impact the vapor and with this energy it mixes with it. Freezing and melting of a liquid as being a result of heat being taken up or given up by its particles.<br />\nV.S 5.2.9 Some apparently solid substances like ghee, lac and wax are in reality liquids, as their particles are naturally \u201cheat-conjoined\u201d or disorganized as in water. Other true solid substances such as tin, lead, iron, silver and gold need their atoms to be supplied with external heat to disorder them before they become a fluid.<br />\nV.S 2.1.67 Any body\u2019s mass needs to be wholly explained in terms of its constituent particles.<br />\nV.S 1.1.89 A substance can only emerge from another substance and not on its own eventhough its properties change from one to another.<br />\nV.S 9.1.9 Any fundamental particular entity can be a constituent multiple substances.<br />\nV.S 1.1.22 Any substance comprising of two or more primary particle types requires a chemical reaction to generate the conjoining and break up of preexisting molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.23 The \u201cmolecules\u201d are stated as emerging from combinations between the fundamental entities.<br />\nV.S 1.1.25 Forces are necessary to bring about combination and break up of molecules.<br />\nV.S 1.1.28 The combinations of particles to produce molecules result in substances with states very different from those of the original particles.<br />\n<br />\nKanada Muni\u2019s laws:<br />\n<br />\nIn the production or increment of karma (i.e. motion), the root cause is force. In other words, there is incremental or decremental change in motion.<br />\nThis law is a law of the measure of force. According to this, so long mechanical force works, there is change in motion i.e. there is momentum. To find its value, it is calculated how much work it produces in a unit time.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c466643263114631994\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nMathematically, the rate of change in momentum i.e. the increment in work in unit time is proportional to the force in action. Also, this change is in the direction of the force. Suppose that the mass of an object is \u2018m\u2019 and in time interval \u2018t\u2019, the velocity of the object changes from \u2018u\u2019 to \u2018v\u2019 due to the force acting on it.<br />\n<br />\nThen, Initial momentum = m*u<br />\nFinal momentum = m*v<br />\nChange in momentum = m(v*u)<br />\nTherefore, the rate of change of momentum = m(v*u)/t<br />\nt = m*a (from Kanada\u2019s first law)<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kandas second law, force is proportional to the rate of change of momentum<br />\nOr, p = k*m*a (where k is a constant)<br />\nIf m=1 and a=1, then<br />\n1 = k*1*1 or k = 1<br />\nOr, p = m*a<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, unit force is the one that produces unit acceleration in an object of unit mass. The VS then goes to say that force is a result of work and is not a physical quantity which is superior to Newtons law that measures it as a physical quantity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe sutras on energy:<br />\n<br />\nVaiseshika defines energy as being a radiant thing(i.e. energy is radiation) and energy is related totemperature and motion of a particle.<br />\n<br />\nVedic Indians understood the process of refraction and absorbtion of energy by \u201cmaterial obstructions\u201d and they understood heat, electricity and magnetism to be forms of energy. It is already understood by the elemental theory that light is also an energy and is composed of discreet units.<br />\n<br />\nThis was of course was not understood in modern times till Max Plank and Einstein in the 20th cetury devised quantum theory after the study of black body radiation and the photoelectric effect.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_175b+seedBBVAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8429058010215276217\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_124M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. SARAH IS HARANs DAUGHTER ( AIYOOO )<br />\n<br />\nSOLOMONs WIFE NAAMAH ( QUEEN SHEBA ) WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN WHO VISITED SOLOMON --AND HE FELL IN LOVE WITH HER WISDOM AND BEAUTY.<br />\n<br />\nTHE SON OF SOLOMON AND NAAMAH WAS REHOBOAM ( KING OF JUDAH ).<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html<br />\n<br />\nI AM JUST TELLING 4%<br />\n<br />\nLET JEWS STOP BEING MEAN AND DECEPTIVE --ONLY THEN THEY CAN KNOW THE TRUTH OF WHO THEY REALLY ARE FROM CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red; She retained the position when she became Prime Minister in 1966.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">H.V. Kamath, MP, moved a private member\u2019s\nBill in the Lok Sabha for the amendment of Articles 75 and 164 of the\nConstitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Bill said thus in the Statement of\nObjects and Reasons: \u201cThe highest traditions of the parliamentary democracy,\nwith a bicameral set-up, demand that the Council of Ministers at the Centre and\nin the States, should consist of members who are directly elected by the people\nand that the Prime or Chief Minister should in no circumstances be a member who\nhas been elected indirectly.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Indira gandhi was pushed in as PM via the Rajya Sabha back door.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">If this provision\nwas UNAVAILABLE Lal Bahadur Shastri would NOT have been poisoned in Tashkent.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Initiating the discussion of the Bill on April\n15, 1966, Kamath said: &nbsp; \u201cIndia should set an example in this matter of\nconstitutional and parliamentary manners. The Constitution should stipulate\ncategorically that the Prime Minister of the Union should be an elected member\nof the Lok Sabha\u2026. Of the 16 Ministers of the present Cabinet, seven are from\nRajya Sabha and nine from Lok Sabha. No other parliamentary democracy in the\nworld shows such an example with regard to its own Cabinet. I am sorry to point\nout that one member who had been defeated in the last election had been\nappointed to the present Cabinet\u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cThe point I am trying to make out is that we\nare establishing bad traditions, setting up unhealthy conventions, which are\nantithetical to the principles and spirit of parliamentary democracy and to\neven the letter of the Constitution.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DOES BHARATMATA GAIN WHEN PM, DEFENCE\nMINISTER, FINANCE MINSTER, I&amp;B MINISTER ETC ARE PUSHED IN VIA THE BACK\nDOOR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHO IS ARUN JAITLEY -- A MERE LAWYER ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHAT IS APCO MODI UP TO ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE KNOW !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">COMMUNIST LEADER H.N. Mukherjee warned &nbsp; \u201cAlready there are indications in the country that the Chief\nMinisters\u2014satraps\u2014Kamath described them as subedars\u2014are becoming too powerful,\nand if in addition to the power which they have come to enjoy in the Congress\nset-up\u2014they dominate in the discussions to decide who is to be the Prime\nMinister..., then, Sir, where is parliamentary democracy leading us to?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">APCO MODI-- &nbsp;WHY IS INDIAN DEMOCRACY CONTROLLED FROM ABROAD\n?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Congress MP Harish Chandra Mathur said \"\nlate Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru had made it abundantly clear to all the\nCabinet Ministers from the other House that if they were to continue in the\nCabinet after the elections, they must contest the elections and come to this\nHouse. I think at present, all that is necessary is a clear enunciation of that\npolicy and a commitment by the government.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Congress leader R.K. Khadilkar,said \u201c Only\nthose who have popular support, those who are in touch with the people, with\ntheir aspirations and all that, alone lead the country and lead the government\nand for that it should be a healthy convention.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">N.C. Chatterjee, MP said&nbsp;&nbsp; \u201d all members of this House should support\nthis measure that in the Constitution we should have a provision that the Prime\nMinister should be an elected member of this House....\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jaisukhlal Hathi, Minister of State for Home,\nsaid: \u201cI may say at once that so far as the government and the party and all of\nus are concerned, those who believe in democracy, in parliamentary method, there\ncan be no doubt in principle that the Prime Minister should be normally a\nmember elected to Lok Sabha.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Indira Gandhi successfully contested the 1967\nelection to be a member of the Lok Sabha and attended the Lok Sabha on March 7,\n1967, as the Leader of the House.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When in 1991, when &nbsp;Jew Rothschild\u2019s man P.V. Narasimha Rao was\nelected Prime Minister, he was not a member of either House of Parliament.&nbsp; &nbsp;Yes, he is the man who brought in all these vested national agencies &nbsp;, who can summon anybody , &nbsp;fine anybody .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Rajiv Gandhi would NOT have been dead of such\na thing was NOT possible.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Things are being controlled from abroad\u2014our vote\nmeans nothing !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What happened to the solemn commitment made\nby the Indira Gandhi government during the Lok Sabha debate of the H.V. Kamath\nBill in 1966?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Was the appointment of Manmohan Singh as\nPrime Minister in 2004 not a departure from the solemn declaration made in 1966\nby the Congress government and the Congress party on the acceptance of the\nprinciple that the Prime Minister should be an elected member of the Lok\nSabha\u2014a principle to be implemented by \u201cconvention having more force than the\nwritten Constitution\u201d?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The government stated in 1966 that \u201cthere may\nbe occasions\u2014that too for a limited period\u2014a Prime Minister has to be from the\nother House\u201d.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rothschild man PM Manmohan\nSingh has continued in the post of Prime Minister for over nine years. &nbsp;Is it a \u201cshort transition period\u201d as\nvisualised in 1966?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Manmohan Singh &nbsp;despite being defeated in the 1999 general\nelection from the South Delhi parliamentary constituency, continued to be Prime\nMinister<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Prime Minister is not merely chairman of\nthe Cabinet; he is, also, responsible for the party organisation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even when the\ngovernment has the majority in the House of Lords, the effective decisions are\ntaken in the lower House.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. feat...</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br /><div>\n<span
