font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Roman Emperor\nConstantine conspired with the Council of Nicaea in A.D. 325 to\ncreate a religion named CHRISTIANITY to suit the Roman Emperors &nbsp;selfish &nbsp;interests. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This \u201cconspiracy,\u201d\notherwise known as basic Christian theology, DELETED the REAL messiah\nApollonius and inserted Jesus Christ. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;This was a EVIL NEXUS between the RULER and\nthe new RELIGION to control the people, where both fed off each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the time of its\nfounding, pagan Rome was steeped in spirituality derived from Hindusim.&nbsp; The pagan gods were Hindus gods , with a spin\nto suit the local culture. All these lands were ruled by India before 7000 BC,\nand these pagan gods existed in the genome of the people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Roman people were\nnever afraid of their gods,rather they loved them.&nbsp; But when the second Roman king, Numa\nPompilius took power in 716 B.C., he established the fear of the gods as one of\nthe main principles governing city life. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Citizens believed the fortunes of Rome\ndepended upon the favor of the gods.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brilliant pagan orator Cicero declared\nin 45 B.C. that public piety was the most distinctive characteristic of the\nRoman. \u201c<i>If, moreover, we care to make a comparison between our own\ncharacteristics and those of foreign nations, while the latter will be found\nequal, or even superior to us in other respects, in religion, that is, in the\nworship of the gods, we shall be found to far excel them.</i>\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By definition, being\nRoman equaled being pagan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pagan Roman Emperor\nNero was given a bad name by Vatican historians &nbsp;that in 64 AD Nero fiddled while Rome burnt.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vatican historians LIED when they said that from A.D. 81 to 96, Emperor\nDomitian continued the acts of Nero against the Christians. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry,\nthose days Christianity did NOT exist .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christianity would kick in only 3 centuries later.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People respected messiah Apollonius, a Hindu\nIndian from Kerala who was a real Colossus more respected than the Emperor .&nbsp; Apollonius was an intellectual was more or\nless like Imhotep, more powerful than the Egyptian Pharaoh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vatican spun its\nmassive bullshit\u2014 that Emperor Domitian in 81 AD &nbsp;used the title \u201cLord and God,\u201d which\nChristians refused to acknowledge.&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u201c The infamous TEST\n(sic) &nbsp;of a Christian appeared during\nthis time. &nbsp;Romans placed statues of the\nEmperor, and the Roman gods Jupiter, Juno, and Minerva before the suspected\nChristian. If the suspect denied the faith, officials required that he repeat a\nformulaic invocation of the gods, and then offer wine and incense to the Emperor\u2019s\nstatue. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is\nwhat happens when you add too much MASALA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Constantine\npromptly&nbsp; exiled him to Illyria on\ncomplaint from rival Alexander from Alexandria .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>JAASTI LAFADA NAHIN MAANGHTA .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xLrsx9PQDzA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xLrsx9PQDzA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Years later,\nConstantine sought to reinstate Arius into communion and ordered the Bishop of\nConstantinople, Alexander, to receive him. Conflicted, Alexander did not want\nto refuse Constantine or receive Arius back into communion. Alexander then shut\nhimself up in a church and prayed that either he or Arius would be removed from\nthe world before Arius was readmitted. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The day before the\nscheduled communion, Arius died grotesquely from a fatal bowel hemorrhage at\nthe forum in Constantinople. The tale of the ugly, bloody scene flew rapidly\namong Christians who took it as a sign of God\u2019s approval of the judgment of the\nNicene Council\u2014 such is the Vatican propaganda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Socrates Scholasticus\n(a detractor of Arius) described Arius's death as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;<i> It was then Saturday, and Arius was expecting\nto assemble with the church on the day following: but divine retribution\novertook his daring criminalities. For going out of the imperial palace,\nattended by a crowd of Eusebian partisans like guards, he paraded proudly\nthrough the midst of the city, attracting the notice of all the people. As he\napproached the place called Constantine\u2019s Forum, where the column of porphyry\nis erected, a terror arising from the remorse of conscience seized Arius, and\nwith the terror a violent relaxation of the bowels: he therefore enquired\nwhether there was a convenient place near, and being directed to the back of\nConstantine\u2019s Forum, he hastened thither. Soon after a faintness came over him,\nand together with the evacuations his bowels protruded, followed by a copious\nhemorrhage, and the descent of the smaller intestines: moreover portions of his\nspleen and liver were brought off in the effusion of blood, so that he almost\nimmediately died. The scene of this catastrophe still is shown at\nConstantinople, as I have said, behind the shambles in the colonnade: and by\npersons going by pointing the finger at the place, there is a perpetual\nremembrance preserved of this extraordinary kind of death</i>.UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Socrates Scholasticus\nPAAJI clarified --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE <i>:That God was not\nalways the Father, but that there was a period when he was not the Father; that\nthe Word of God was not from eternity, but was made out of nothing; for that\nthe ever-existing God (\u2018the I AM\u2019\u2014the eternal One) made him who did not\npreviously exist, out of nothing; wherefore there was a time when he did not\nexist, inasmuch as the Son is a creature and a work. That he is neither like\nthe Father as it regards his essence, nor is by nature either the Father\u2019s true\nWord, or true Wisdom, but indeed one of his works and creatures, being\nerroneously called Word and Wisdom, since he was himself made of God\u2019s own Word\nand the Wisdom which is in God, whereby God both made all things and him also.\nWherefore he is as to his nature mutable and susceptible of change, as all\nother rational creatures are: hence the Word is alien to and other than the\nessence of God; and the Father is inexplicable by the Son, and invisible to\nhim, for neither does the Word perfectly and accurately know the Father,\nneither can he distinctly see him. The Son knows not the nature of his own\nessence: for he was made on our account, in order that God might create us by\nhim, as by an instrument; nor would he ever have existed, unless God had wished\nto create us.</i> :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BAAP RE !-- &nbsp;ITHNAA LAFADA ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOLD IT, MY HEAD IS\nSPINNING\u2014I NEED TO TAKE SOME DEEP BREATHS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alexander PAAJI\nsimplified it for dummies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;<i> God has not always been Father; there was a\nmoment when he was alone, and was not yet Father: later he became so. The Son\nis not from eternity; he came from nothing</i>.UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2014\u2009Alexander\n(Trinitarian)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Pagan Roman emperor Julian\nrevered the mother goddess Cybele ( Magna Mater \u2013DURGA ) and wrote a hymn to\nher. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ym9qm6cs3sg/VviFCWt_2rI/AAAAAAABGyU/0J5NYFqFl5gDJdMLvfYbG6RjVta8CgOgw/s1600/Cybele-Fertility-Pgn601.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ym9qm6cs3sg/VviFCWt_2rI/AAAAAAABGyU/0J5NYFqFl5gDJdMLvfYbG6RjVta8CgOgw/s640/Cybele-Fertility-Pgn601.jpg\" width=\"410\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vatican IMMORAL\npropaganda is as follows--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;QUOTE: &nbsp;The\nmysteries of Cybele were some of the most bizarre in the pagan world. &nbsp;In fits\nof trance fervor, Cybele\u2019s <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">priests would fully emasculate themselves and\nafterwards, don female clothes and offer themselves as prostitutes at the\ntemple.</b> This is how the Romans observed the SACRED FEMININE\u201d : UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: 2000 year old broken Greek vase of Goddess Cybele</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LtCR9ut7aBo/VviFrPkjF-I/AAAAAAABGyc/mZ9pVxWRiDoyPIiquRrFGdhcD3TPJyryA/s1600/244a7f7be9cc2TT6b326c6297e89856898.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LtCR9ut7aBo/VviFrPkjF-I/AAAAAAABGyc/mZ9pVxWRiDoyPIiquRrFGdhcD3TPJyryA/s640/244a7f7be9cc2TT6b326c6297e89856898.jpg\" width=\"618\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HEY POPE- DID THESE EMASCULATED PRIESTS EAT THEIR OWN SHIT TOO ?</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gXN17Ybrkxc/VviGaxmtZxI/AAAAAAABGys/rGUZSWB4FosZuSbYvcIVdC_CATxIJnfbg/s1600/aa27d47c4fc454a3cdggf48e47e82aacfa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gXN17Ybrkxc/VviGaxmtZxI/AAAAAAABGys/rGUZSWB4FosZuSbYvcIVdC_CATxIJnfbg/s400/aa27d47c4fc454a3cdggf48e47e82aacfa.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fACDLrLGGRU/VviGBymhfiI/AAAAAAABGyk/TRqGEGnPRME6Qt2LytYceBjVVSuVR8GuA/s1600/382863_101503g81210751962_1109297262_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"633\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fACDLrLGGRU/VviGBymhfiI/AAAAAAABGyk/TRqGEGnPRME6Qt2LytYceBjVVSuVR8GuA/s640/382863_101503g81210751962_1109297262_n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nOn June 17, 362, Julian issued his famous \u201cschool law,\u201d which effectively excluded Christians from teaching. &nbsp; &nbsp;Pagans teachers with great lineage were intellectuals - and classrooms were empty. .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Emperors who\nfollowed, Jovian, Valentinian, Valens, and Gratian, all tried to strike a\nbalance between paganism and Christianity. &nbsp;Each one retained the title of Pontifex\nMaximus and continued the religion of pagan god Sol Invictus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Change came when\nTheodosius the Great &nbsp;became Emperor in\n378 AD. Theodosius was the last emperor to rule over both the eastern and the\nwestern halves of the Roman Empire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Upon his baptism in 380, Theodosius turned the\nchurches of Constantinople to the Nicene Creed. Theodosius declared that only\nNicene Christianity would be practiced throughout the Roman Empire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is responsible for the\ndestruction of prominent Hellenistic temples of classical antiquity, including\nthe Temple of Apollo in Delphi and the Serapeum in Alexandria.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Pagan temple of Apollo at Delphi</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IoR5hUUmlds/VviMFcX3ABI/AAAAAAABGzA/mVs5TfoDmUYRT9IBiHO5FndOMgSdWLYZQ/s1600/The_Temple_of_ApolloD_at_Delphi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IoR5hUUmlds/VviMFcX3ABI/AAAAAAABGzA/mVs5TfoDmUYRT9IBiHO5FndOMgSdWLYZQ/s640/The_Temple_of_ApolloD_at_Delphi.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kQ_Fuam0qB0/VviMiBV4QYI/AAAAAAABGzE/AMMRokqaySYyhyoRk2lKD2lBz8nmdWQXQ/s1600/09ew.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"422\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kQ_Fuam0qB0/VviMiBV4QYI/AAAAAAABGzE/AMMRokqaySYyhyoRk2lKD2lBz8nmdWQXQ/s640/09ew.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Below: &nbsp;Pagan temple Serapeum in Alexandria.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hux10HSX_14/VviNOClj57I/AAAAAAABGzU/AMZBTB9IyJY_dRNOPOIlVNn9puGgXHuFg/s1600/img_28x31.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hux10HSX_14/VviNOClj57I/AAAAAAABGzU/AMZBTB9IyJY_dRNOPOIlVNn9puGgXHuFg/s640/img_28x31.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Z35U5FtGobI/VviM5csLNQI/AAAAAAABGzM/-Q2qYzmkydgK1UttqhYbUZWbvoHiMA8MA/s1600/slidedr1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Z35U5FtGobI/VviM5csLNQI/AAAAAAABGzM/-Q2qYzmkydgK1UttqhYbUZWbvoHiMA8MA/s640/slidedr1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read the Vatican\npropaganda :-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;<i> As the imperial rescript was read aloud and\nit became clear that the evil pagans were being held responsible, the\nChristians, shouting their joy, assailed the temple. They hesitated, however,\nto desecrate the figure of Serapis itself, fearful that, \"if a human hand\ntouched the statue, the earth would split open on the spot and crumble into the\nabyss, while the sky would crash down at once\" (II.23). &nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Then, at the\ninstigation of &nbsp;the Most Excellent and Worshipful &nbsp;Theophilus, one of the soldiers took an axe and struck the god\non the jaw. Everyone cried out but, when the sky did not fall, the head was\nchopped off. Theodoret (Ecclesiastical History, V.22) relates that a horde of\nmice ran out from the hollow cavity, no doubt to the glee of the Christians.\nThe rest of the huge idol was broken into pieces, the head carried through the\ntown and the god burned in front of the sullen pagans who had worshiped him:</i>UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;He dissolved the\norder of the Vestal Virgins in Rome.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 393, he banned the pagan rituals of the\nOlympics in Ancient Greece. (It was not until the end of the 19th century, in\n1896, that the Olympics were held again.)&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After his death, Theodosius' young\nsons Arcadius and Honorius inherited the east and west halves respectively, and\nthe Roman Empire was never again re-united<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under Bishop of Milan\nAmbrose's major influence, emperors Gratian, Valentinian II and Theodosius the\nGreat , carried on a bloody persecution of Paganism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Central to Ambrose is\nthe virginity of Mary and her role as Mother of God. He insisted on the theory\nof IMMACULATE CONCEPTION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ambrose spAke--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; The virgin birth is worthy of God. Which\nhuman birth would have been more worthy of God, than the one, in which the\nImmaculate Son of God maintained the purity of his immaculate origin while\nbecoming human?&nbsp; We confess, that Christ\nthe Lord was born from a virgin, and therefore we reject the natural order of\nthings. Because not from a man she conceived but from the Holy Spirit.&nbsp; Christ is not divided but one. If we adore\nhim as the Son of God, we do not deny his birth from the virgin\u2026 But nobody\nshall extend this to Mary. Mary was the temple of God but not God in the\ntemple. Therefore, only the one who was in the temple can be worshipped.&nbsp; Yes, truly blessed for having surpassed the\npriest (Zechariah). While the priest denied, the Virgin rectified the error. No\nwonder that the Lord, wishing to rescue the world, began his work with Mary.\nThus she, through whom salvation was being prepared for all people, would be\nthe first to receive the promised fruit of salvation.UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">BAAAP RE !</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A series of Theodosian the\nGreat\u2019s decrees followed, prohibiting Homams, closing pagan temples, outlawing\nidolatry, extinguishing the \u201ceternal fire\u201d in the temple of Vesta, outlawing pagan\nastrology, divination, removing the Altar of Victory from the Senate in Rome, torturing and killing pagan diviners, and canceling the Olympic Games.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UfGXD6ZvxTA/VviRUz4JkaI/AAAAAAABGzk/QlLpI4UHIgwX0MB-jhND0ABCIdRG4yezA/s1600/1814145200_dd36329e4669.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UfGXD6ZvxTA/VviRUz4JkaI/AAAAAAABGzk/QlLpI4UHIgwX0MB-jhND0ABCIdRG4yezA/s640/1814145200_dd36329e4669.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 392, when Theodosius authorized the\ndestruction of the spectacular temple of Serapis in Alexandria\u2014this created a\ndomino effect and all glorious pagan temples were destroyed throughout the\nempire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE IS THE SAME\nVATICAN &nbsp;WHO GAVE INDIA A LECTURE FOR\nBABRI MASJID \u2013 AND A LECTURE TO ISIS FOR PALMYRA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CWS0ePXeq24/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/CWS0ePXeq24?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>IF YOU EXPOSE VATICAN\u2019S\nMURDEROUS HISTORY, YOU WILL BE IMPRISONED AND MADE A PAUPER.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SEE, POPE IS GODs MIDDLEMAN WITH A HOTLINE , RIGHT ? &nbsp;--</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>HOW CAN A POPE BE EVIL ?</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2210428/Trial-starts-Popes-butler-stole-leaked-papal-letters-expose-evil-corruption-Roman-Catholic-church.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL KILLINGS OF PAGAN\nMOORS HAVE BEEN CARRIED OUT BY THE POPE.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOORS WERE NOT MUSLIMS AS PER ROTHSCHILD HISTORIANS PROPAGANDA.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE MOORS WERE HINDU INTELLECTUALS NOT BLACK\nAFRICAN SOLDIERS. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The intellectual\nachievements of the Moors in Spain had a lasting effect; education was\nuniversal in Moorish Spain, while in Christian Europe, 99.1% of the population\nwas illiterate, and even kings could neither read nor write.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a time when\nEurope had only two universities, the Moors had seventeen, located in Almeria,\nCordova, Granada, Juen, Malaga, Seville, and Toledo. in the 10th and 11th\ncenturies, public libraries in Europe were non-existent, while Moorish Spain\ncould boast of more than 70.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Universities in Paris\nand Oxford were established after visits by scholars to Moorish Spain\u2019s library\nCordova.&nbsp; A lot of books were in Arabic, Malayalam and Sanskrit .\nThese books were translated to Arabic knowledge in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/mansa-musa-king-of-mali-and-sri.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Christians set up a\ngiant translating program in Toledo.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using the Arabic as interpreters, they\ntranslated the Arabic books into Latin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These books included&nbsp; most of the major works of Greek ( sic ) science\nand philosophy.. Every Greek ancient knowledge was LIFTED from Kodungallur\nUnivesity owned by the Calicut King.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"The subjects covered by\nthe texts included medicine, astrology, astronomy pharmacology, psychology,\nphysiology, zoology, biology, botany, mineralogy, optics, chemistry, physics,\nmathematics, algebra, geometry, trigonometry, music, meteorology, geography,\nmechanics, hydrostatics, navigation and history.\"</span></i> <b>(Burke, 1985, p. 42)</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Found among the works\nwere even Arab philosophers' commentaries of Greek Aristotle's views. This\n\"shocked the West by giving religion and philosophy equal status as\nsystems for explaining the cosmos.</span></i>\" <b>(Burke, 1985, p. 42)&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This questioning\nand the use of logic revolutionized the definition of truth and sparked the\nrenaissance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The translations\ncontinued as each Moorish PAGAN haven fell to the Christians .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Even the concept of\nZero (an Arabic word) came from the translations</span></i> \u2013SIC (Castillo &amp; Bond,\n1987, p. 27) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Along with texts,\nArabic music ( SIC) spread throughout Europe, giving us the keyboard, the flute\nand the concept of harmony. It's also fair to say that renaissance\narchitectural concepts came from the Moorish libraries.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sadly, all Jews and\nMuslims</span></i> ( sic \u2013 JEWS AND MUSLIMS HAD NO ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE OTHER THAN WHAT THEY\nLIFTED OR BOUGHT FROM KERALA )&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> that\nwould not abandon their beliefs were either killed or exiled (Grolier, History\nof Spain). Thus ended an epoch of tolerance and all that would remain of the\nMoors would be their books.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Mathematics and\narchitecture explained in the Arab texts along with Arab works on optics led to\nthe perspective paintings of the renaissance period</span></i> (Burke, 1985 p. 72). <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The first\nlawyers began their craft using the new translated knowledge as their guide.\nEven the food utensils we use today come from the Cordova kitchen!</span></i> (Burke, 1985\np. 44) &nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All of these examples show just some of the ways Europe transformed.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much of what we are\ntoday can find it's roots in the once great PAGAN Moorish culture of Spain.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Statue of 4 moors&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JCWPHfBRG6Y/VvpgbmXfwZI/AAAAAAABG1Y/0mnPwJhRR-knQtveZYtWozt7KDn63dLyA/s1600/0903060SS190.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JCWPHfBRG6Y/VvpgbmXfwZI/AAAAAAABG1Y/0mnPwJhRR-knQtveZYtWozt7KDn63dLyA/s640/0903060SS190.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">EVERY VESTIGE OF MOOR\nBOOK KNOWLEDGE WAS LIFTED &nbsp;/ &nbsp;BOUGHT FROM KODUNGALLUR &nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">UNIVERSITY</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp; OWNED BY THE\nCALICUT KING ( MY HOMETOWN )</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Moor\nintellectuals were all dark skinned has a peculiar hairstyle<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS IS THE LAST DAY , CHRISTIANS, JEWS AND MUSLIMS CAN HIJACK MOOR HINDU KNOWLEDGE IN TRANSLATED BOOKS.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>SATYA VACHCHAN <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DATE: &nbsp;29<sup>TH</sup> MARCH 2016</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>TIME:&nbsp; 1619 IST</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Europeans came to\nknow of Kerala spices from the Moor Market in Cordoba.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were herbs and\nspices such as pepper, turmeric, cardamom, ginger, cinnamon, &nbsp;cumin, caraway, coriander, fennel, mint,\nparsley, cloves and nutmeg. &nbsp;&nbsp;All these\nspices were available only in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IN\nKERALA WE CALL PAGAN MOORS , MANICHAEANS OR NASRANIS. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THEY\nCAME FOR REGUSE BACK HOME IN KERALA BY SHIP IN LARGE NUMBERS ON BEING\nPERSECUTED BY THE VATICAN.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>NEVER\nMIND THE PROPAGANDA OF THE KERALA SYRIAN JEW NAY CHRSTIAN MEDIA AND CLERGY-- &nbsp;MANICHAEANS / NASRANIS WERE PAGAN HINDUS ( NOT\nCHRISTIANS ).&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN THOSE DAYS CHRISTIANS\nPERSECUTED PAGAN HINDUS ( BY BURNING , BEING &nbsp;ACCUSED AS&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">SORCERERS / DIVINERS&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;) , NOT&nbsp; VICE VERSA<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SORRY\nVATICAN AND ROTHSCHILD HISTORIANS, IT IS THE INTERNET AGE !<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EVEN\nTODAY WE IN KERALA CALL THESE PAGAN HINDU MANICHAEANS&nbsp;\nCONVERTED TO CHRISTIANS </b><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">IN DERISION </b><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">AS &nbsp;-- ACHAEANS .</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">SOMEBODY CALLED UP UP AND CRIED--\"WHY DID YOU NOT TELL ALL THIS BEFORE\"</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WELL GENTLEMEN--</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">EVEN MENTAL COPULATION HAS NOT STARTED &nbsp;--&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">PRE FOREPLAY, &nbsp;UNDRESSING, &nbsp; FOREPLAY, &nbsp;IMPALING, &nbsp; HUMPING AND SEXUAL ORGASM IS FAR AWAY . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>MY REVELATIONS HAVE JUST REACHED </b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>16.70 % </b></span><b>AFTER &nbsp;979 BLOG POSTS.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the year 1518\nto1548, fifteen million Protestants perished by war and the Catholic Inquisition.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Edict of\nNantes&nbsp; signed on 30 April 1598, by King\nHenry IV of France, granted the Protestants of France (also known as Huguenots)\nsubstantial rights in the nation, which was, at the time, still considered\nessentially Catholic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Revocation of the Edict\nof Nantes in October by the Edict of Fontainebleau&nbsp; 1685 by Louis XIV, the grandson of Henry IV,\ndrove an exodus of Protestants, and increased the hostility of Protestant\nnations bordering France.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YHo-tDVyt_0/Vvp9rlXj0rI/AAAAAAABG2A/nkCAL-o1N1U96aDBopKAriwE2z-Z51Rmw/s1600/imagFes.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YHo-tDVyt_0/Vvp9rlXj0rI/AAAAAAABG2A/nkCAL-o1N1U96aDBopKAriwE2z-Z51Rmw/s400/imagFes.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eleven articles of\nthe Edict of Fontainebleau ( &nbsp;driven by Pope Innocent XI ) revoked the ruling of the Edict of Nantes.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It laid\ndown that:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--- all Reformed\nchurches were to be destroyed <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">----- all Reformed\nministers were to convert to the Catholic religion or leave France within 2\nweeks<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- ---- those ministers\nwilling to abjure their Protestant faith were to receive an increase in their\nsalary by one third<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">----- the children of\nProtestants were to be baptised and educated as Catholics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">------ Protestant\nschools were forbidden <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-----&nbsp; Huguenots were forbidden to leave France<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---&nbsp;&nbsp; Protestants who had left the kingdom before\nthe promulgation of the edict were allowed to return and retrieve their\nproperty within 4 months, provided they adjured their Protestant faith <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- --Protestants who\nhad remained in France would be allowed to stay without disadvantages as long\nas they refrained from holding public services ... till God enlightened them\nlike the others <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">More than two million\nHuguenots fled France&nbsp; and a million and\nhalf converted, unwillingly&nbsp; to\nCatholicism. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SEE THERE HAS TO BE A\nBROKER BETWEEN MAN AND GOD, WEARING FUNNY ROBES AND HOLDING A CROOKED STAFF !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GX_r8FFjMMI/VvqjNQHH1EI/AAAAAAABG2Q/BQfn2byj_lAk4Rru6t2iwfCNNFzFhlyNQ/s1600/slide_UB8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GX_r8FFjMMI/VvqjNQHH1EI/AAAAAAABG2Q/BQfn2byj_lAk4Rru6t2iwfCNNFzFhlyNQ/s400/slide_UB8.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GMjUuEVSjvA/VvqjnhqxGDI/AAAAAAABG2U/9Op809kxBMUgAWY5faXAeJfD_cBM4YF0A/s1600/Rslide_17.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">CATHOLIC CHRISTIANITY IS DYING--</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">GAYS AND LESBIANS ARE BECOMING PRIESTS -&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">VATICAN SHIELDS PEDOPHILE CRIMES BY CLERGY.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">VATICAN MUST ALLOW PRIESTS TO MARRY -- &nbsp;OR &nbsp;THIS BRANCH WILL DIE SOON.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-o77IPk-HRx8/VvqkCenwLSI/AAAAAAABG2c/JfGEXxGj6echssVsM62i5C5VMQtx8kmvQ/s1600/the-reformatXion-13-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/mormons-bankrolled-by-rothschild-capt.html\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/mormons-bankrolled-by-rothschild-capt.html</b></span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SuUSO_KAz1Q/VvqleIYyZLI/AAAAAAABG2s/KJWZXoW5HJo3mpnmbcI2O33hLMTr4kYBg/s1600/vaticKan-homo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"198\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SuUSO_KAz1Q/VvqleIYyZLI/AAAAAAABG2s/KJWZXoW5HJo3mpnmbcI2O33hLMTr4kYBg/s400/vaticKan-homo.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Louis XIV largely left\nthe decision-making to Mazarin, his mentor and godfather. But when Mazarin died\nin 1661, the 22-year-old immediately informed his astonished court that he\nwould henceforth rule without a chief minister\u2014something no French king had done\nfor generations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Louis XIV was then\ncontrolled by his Finance minister ,&nbsp; a\nJEW Jean-Baptiste Colbert in Rothschild\u2019s employment. After Colbert baby died\nhis son &nbsp;Jean-Baptiste Colbert, Marquis\nde Seignelay controlled King Louis XIV.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Born in 1638, Louis XIV\nbecame king at age 4 following the death of his father, Louis XIII, and\nremained on the throne for the next 72 years. This marks him as both the\nlongest-reigning French monarch in history and the longest-reigning monarch of\nany extant European nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Louis XIII of France\nwas the son of King Henry IV. &nbsp;&nbsp;King\nLouis XIII at the age of 9 (after Jews assassinated his &nbsp;father ).&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Louis XIII took\nover power &nbsp;in 1617 by exiling his mother\nand executing her crypto jew Finance minister &nbsp;Concino Concini (&nbsp; his mother\u2019s lover ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Louis XIII was a\nhomosexual and that too receiving anal sex party . There was no way he could\nhave his own child.&nbsp; King Louis XIV was a\nROYAL BASTARD -- a child of a reigning monarch born out of wedlock.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He would walk around in\nwomen\u2019s clothes wearing lipstick and a wig.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;This became fashion for 2\ncenturies till the French revolution. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Louis\nXIII, his wife Anne, and Cardinal Richelieu became central figures in Alexandre\nDumas, p\u00e8re's novel The Three Musketeers.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--QndLKPsd9g/Vvse7p0OOTI/AAAAAAABG3E/ly2tZ6cwJ_Ywu5G62KXJ_2n8Wfh3XOVFQ/s1600/97803r07594990.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/--QndLKPsd9g/Vvse7p0OOTI/AAAAAAABG3E/ly2tZ6cwJ_Ywu5G62KXJ_2n8Wfh3XOVFQ/s640/97803r07594990.jpg\" width=\"390\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On November 19, 1703, a\ntomb in the Bastille\u2019s Saint Paul Cemetery welcomed the corpse of a man who had\nspent almost the last four decades of his life in various prisons of France. He\nis without a doubt the most famous prisoner in French history, even though\nnobody knows why he had to spend over thirty-five years in prison, reportedly\nin near perfect isolation and often with his face covered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This prisoner ( without\na tongue ) &nbsp;was made famous by Alexandre\nDumas, The Man in the Iron Mask, which was the third and final book in the\nseries that began with The Three Musketeers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Voltaire and in turn\nthe prisoners who supposedly saw the man in the iron mask at the Bastille, this\nprisoner had to wear the mask at all times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Voltaire,\nthe man in the iron mask was the older, illegitimate brother of Louis XIV (via\nCardinal Mazarin and Jewess Anne of Austria), while according to Alexander Dumas,\nthe mysterious prisoner was none other than Louis XIV\u2019s twin, who was minutes\nolder and thus the legitimate king of France.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7mP3y4-UVvI/VvseVC0GW3I/AAAAAAABG28/OfbKKxKTSmMF79PV2zp9_SP5xlsmCcJYg/s1600/978184088224351-uk-300.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7mP3y4-UVvI/VvseVC0GW3I/AAAAAAABG28/OfbKKxKTSmMF79PV2zp9_SP5xlsmCcJYg/s640/978184088224351-uk-300.jpg\" width=\"409\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
