font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: Rabid anti-Hindu Muslim Anil Dharkar, &nbsp;fame aur fortune ka bhookha Amitabh Bachchan with Amish Tripathi.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT to insult, but to show that\nthey are protected by the pagan goddess Kali--wife of Lord Shiva who resides on top of the mountain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rongorongo is Oceania's\nonly indigenous pagan script.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/gYJSO0ZXIQ4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/gYJSO0ZXIQ4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"></span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">CHRISTIANITY USURPED ALL PAGAN HOLIDAYS AND\nGAVE IT A VATICAN SPIN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The entire pagan world celebrated MAUNDY\nTHURSDAY millenniums before Jesus Christ was born .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They celebrated it as a day for JUPITER ( &nbsp;Brihaspati &nbsp;/ Thor &nbsp;) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Thursday is a corruption for THORSday. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Hindu calendar GURUVAR is Thursday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Latin dies Jovis \"day of Jupiter\"/ Ancient\nGreek hemera Dios \"day of Zeus\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In India THURSDAY is guruvar , the day of the\nGuru of the gods Bhrihaspati - and in Hindu astrology the planet is Jupiter .&nbsp; Mind you all this is milliniums before the\nwhite name spoke a language other than GRUNT GRUNT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia ( lifted from my blog\n) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE: <i>There are a number of modern names\nimitating the naming of Thursday after an equivalent of \"Jupiter\" in\nlocal tradition. In most of the languages of India, the word for Thursday is\nGuruvar \u2013 var meaning day and guru being the style for B\u1e5bhaspati, guru to the\ngods and regent of the planet Jupiter.</i>: UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thursday\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thursday</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vatican has usurped Brihaspati\u2019s day and\nconverted it into a Christian festival so that Pagans continue to celebrate the\nday . This is the immoral way they killed Paganism .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It commemorates the Maundy and Last Supper of\nJesus Christ with the Apostles as described in the Canonical gospels. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Maundy Thursday is a holiday in almost all\nChristian nations including the State of Kerala.&nbsp; It is a statewide public holiday declared by the\nGovernment of Kerala, given the high number of Saint Thomas Christians or\nNasranis in the state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; &nbsp; St Thomas Christians must know that when Thomas came to Kerala , there was NO Christianity. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Even today Muslim Arabs do NOT why Friday is\na holiday for them.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Or why they say SHUKRAN for \u201cthank god\u201d.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SS5IfA7KaX0/VvTZ3qUe-II/AAAAAAABGn0/-b-OixYW24glNRjf6q8A0RaUfuOKSGIMQ/s1600/nakshatratfable.GIF\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SS5IfA7KaX0/VvTZ3qUe-II/AAAAAAABGn0/-b-OixYW24glNRjf6q8A0RaUfuOKSGIMQ/s640/nakshatratfable.GIF\" width=\"490\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sanskrit /\nMalayalam term DASHA &nbsp;in Hindu astrology\nis used to indicate planetary periods. The planetary periods indicate when the\ngood or bad effects are produced according to their placement by sign (Rasi),\nhouse (Bhava), combinations (Yogam) or aspects (Drishti).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Dasha Paddhati\n(system) of Directional Astrology is unique to the Hindus, it is found nowhere\nelse. There are nine planets or grahas which severally rule the nine dashas:\nthe seven classical planets, plus the north node, Rahu, and south node, Ketu,\nof the Moon.&nbsp; There are at least 43\ndifferent dasha systems<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"></span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The astrological dasha period\nof each one of the planets has a &nbsp;strong\ncorrelation with the orbital motion characteristics of its rival grahas.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Planets like </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Jupiter ( Brihaspati ) and Venus &nbsp;(Shukracharya)</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> form such rival pairs by\nvirtue of being lords of houses or signs opposite to each other or due to their\nnatural enmity. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ns-FFP8u6fc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ns-FFP8u6fc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each planet in a rival\nplanet pair determines the dasha period of other planet in the pair. As such,\nboth the planets are loosely called rivals in astrology even though naturally,\nthey may not be so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"></span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The planets Mercury and\nSaturn are considered friendly to Shukra, the Sun, the Moon and Jupiter are\nhostile, and the rest are considered neutral.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shuracharya is a male and is not\na female as wrongly portrayed by western astrology. Venus, like all other\nplanets in Vedic astrology, is a demigod and not a demi-goddess. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Son of\nBrihaspati ,&nbsp; Kacha ( Hercules&nbsp; ) did LOVE JIHAD with Shukracharya\u2019s daughter\nDevyani.&nbsp; Kacha&nbsp; without revealing that he was son of bitter\nrival Brihaspati, became a student of Shukracharya to learn the art of mrityu-sanjivani\nor reviving the dead.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beautiful\nDevayani fell in love with Kacha and desired to marry him, but Kacha refused\nbecause she was the daughter of his teacher.&nbsp;\nShe retaliated by cursing him that when he needed to employ the art of\nmrityu-sanjivani, it would be ineffective.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Vedic astrology, the malefic seven-year period (mahadasha) of Ketu is\nfollowed by the benefic twenty-year period of Shukra. In Bhagavad Gita (10.37)\nVishnu avatar&nbsp; Krishna describes Shri\nShukracharya as one of Vishnu\u2019s representatives.&nbsp; Lord Krishna said&nbsp; \u201c...muninam apy aham vyasah kavinam ushana\nkavih.\u201d&nbsp; \u201cAmong great seers I am Ushana\n(Shukra)\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In astrology,&nbsp; Brihaspati&nbsp;\n( Jupiter ) ) is called the \u201cgreater benefic\u201d because his portfolio\nrules such assets as religion, philosophy, banking, progeny and education.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Shukracharya ( Venus )&nbsp; is referred to as the \u201clesser benefic\u201d\nbecause his benefits range from dining, luxuries and various pleasures of sense\ngratification to the arts.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Bhagavad\nGita, Lord Krishna says both&nbsp; Deva Guru\n(Jupiter) and Asura Guru (Venus) represent Him.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never mind idiots like Devadutt Pattanaik or Amish Tripati, who thinks\nHindu gods are mere tribal mortals and NOT cosmic allegories.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Brihaspati and Shukracharya worship\nVishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n</span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The synodic period of\nMoon is 29.5 days. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Venus ( Shukra also\nmeans seed ) is responsible for life and the first month after conception is\nruled by Venus. &nbsp;During the time it takes\nfor human birth to take place or gestation period to end (approximately nine\nmonths), the Moon completes around nine synodic periods or lunar months lasting\nfrom one New Moon to the next.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Moon and Sun are\nboth enemies of Venus &nbsp;in astrology. &nbsp;Jupiter ( Brihaspati ) who considers Venus (Shukracharya\n) as its enemy fulfills the same role after birth as done by Sun and Moon\nbefore birth. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp; Earth, Sun and Jupiter again align at the\nsolar return point after 12 years when Jupiter completes 11 synodic periods\n(11*1,092 years). &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For Shukra, the\ntotal span (of the Sri Yantra / OM &nbsp;constant 108) &nbsp;years is 9 times this 12 year solar return\nsynodic period of its rival, Jupiter or after approximately 9 orbital periods\nof Jupiter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Vishnu avatar &nbsp;Varaha boar set the cosmic constant as 108, till\n&nbsp;701 BC&nbsp;\n(when only Indian Hindus knew astronomy )the orbital periods of most of\nthe planets were in perfect ratio. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Kama and wife Rati</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-h_lw_p7EA1I/VvTnAs7c98I/AAAAAAABGoE/PSLBXwQNAiwmGeb1VeRCR8heXheYG6BjA/s1600/220px-Kama_hRati.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-h_lw_p7EA1I/VvTnAs7c98I/AAAAAAABGoE/PSLBXwQNAiwmGeb1VeRCR8heXheYG6BjA/s640/220px-Kama_hRati.jpg\" width=\"535\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\npagans in Europe celebrated Vasant Panchami , on the fifth day of the bright\nhalf of the Indian month of Magha . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">THIS\nFESTIVAL HAS BEEN STOLEN BY IMMORAL VATICAN TO VALENTINEs DAY </span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vasant\nPanchami is associated with Shringara Rasam and the festival was celebrated with\ngreat joy in this tradition by UNMARRIED men and women.. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PqTnI3caRRE/VvTqqXYRDsI/AAAAAAABGog/inR8hsAyIqIxPQGvL5eS3dOBU8HtbGEfg/s1600/kamdev-rati-5N2f08963530ee_exl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PqTnI3caRRE/VvTqqXYRDsI/AAAAAAABGog/inR8hsAyIqIxPQGvL5eS3dOBU8HtbGEfg/s400/kamdev-rati-5N2f08963530ee_exl.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Celebrations\ntoday &nbsp;honor Kamadeva, his wife Rati, and\nhis friend Vasant (the personification of Spring). &nbsp;&nbsp;A\nconstant companion of Kama, Rati is often depicted with him in legend and\ntemple sculpture. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: The wolf thingy was an add on by the immoral Vatican</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QfRDuDJ5YQU/VvTwQfQnCSI/AAAAAAABGpA/Ovet5i6C6AIm8zPJSQ38xkI5ZwGGz9sNA/s1600/lupercalia-4-pp728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QfRDuDJ5YQU/VvTwQfQnCSI/AAAAAAABGpA/Ovet5i6C6AIm8zPJSQ38xkI5ZwGGz9sNA/s640/lupercalia-4-pp728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rati is\nthe Hindu goddess of love and passion.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fVIoQyqihKI/VvTqAAFnyaI/AAAAAAABGoY/tIqkdvqfz5Y-5-_LtcGch-Orbzfx5uP9Q/s1600/index27.53174909_stDd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"312\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fVIoQyqihKI/VvTqAAFnyaI/AAAAAAABGoY/tIqkdvqfz5Y-5-_LtcGch-Orbzfx5uP9Q/s400/index27.53174909_stDd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 40-day period\nbetween Vasant Panchami and Holi corresponds with the 40 days of Rati's penance\nafter her husband, Kamadeva was reduced to ashes for shooting the eye of Shiva\nwith his love arrows.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-09yxP7VuaoY/VvTu5jckjXI/AAAAAAABGo4/owpZDVL-sAMtHZkmXSQmlTjAfXsp7H9MA/s1600/beautiful-girmml-with-kite-happy-basant-panchmi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Japanese\nSamurai were Ganesha worshippers \u2013 NOT Buddha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/lord-ganesha-and-milk-drinking-episode.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/lord-ganesha-and-milk-drinking-episode.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below:&nbsp; Kankiten Statue near entrance to Fukuoka\nTower- 20 minutes from Nishi-Arashi Station. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Even today there are 243 Ganesha temples in Japan . &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I have seen some of them. &nbsp;The ancient Japanese emperors and the Samurai worshipped Ganesha. &nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">After the Samurai system was abolished by the Rothschild's stooge weak emperor , all Ganesha idols were hidden.</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: One hand is holding Shiva's &nbsp;DAMARU .</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/shabda-brahman-beat-of-damarau-drum-of.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/shabda-brahman-beat-of-damarau-drum-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XRA93Dwj1Z8/VvY2017YFZI/AAAAAAABGqs/nRzmc96ZX7ASkrl5baZOAl2z_hPFB99Nw/s1600/marisiten-miurcfa-family-1793-big.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XRA93Dwj1Z8/VvY2017YFZI/AAAAAAABGqs/nRzmc96ZX7ASkrl5baZOAl2z_hPFB99Nw/s640/marisiten-miurcfa-family-1793-big.jpg\" width=\"425\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The druids were NOT\npriests \u2013 they were the INTELLECTUALS accepted by the people. Their class\nincluded philosophers, judges, teachers , herbal doctors ( Ayurveda ),\nastronomers, mathematicians,&nbsp; poets, and law\ngivers -&nbsp; among several other learned\nprofessions. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The druids were spiritual\nleaders whom people were very comfortable with as there were no rules or dogmas\n, they just showed the path to self realisation.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Druids concentrated of DHARMA or righteous\nliving , while being congruent to the environment (Vaastu ).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Druids were all\nvegans and have been falsely blamed by Vatican for human and animal sacrifices...\nThe fundamentals of Dharma as per the Bhagwat Gita are-- respect, truth, grace,\nrestraint, love, non-violence, restraint, lack of jealousy and greed, knowledge\nof self and austerity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole idea of Vaastu was to construct something\nwithout disturbing the flow of nature and interrupting natural flow of energy.\nIt is about peaceful co-existence and comfort.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the heroic\nCatholic Templar knights embraced Hinduism after excavating Solomon\u2019s temple ,\nthey were burnt at the stake by the Vatican.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If these knights wanted they could\nhave run all over France and the Vatican.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was their new vegetarian \u201cPagan\u201d\nfaith which prevented them from doing so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/secret-excavations-at-jerusalem-by.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/secret-excavations-at-jerusalem-by.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n</span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Templars started\noff as the blood thirsty and unscrupulous military wing of the Pope killing\npagans . Jews and Muslims. &nbsp;&nbsp;A kick back\nfrom the &nbsp;treasures they stole came to\nthe Pope. This was a time when the white men\u2019s abode was in total poverty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But as soon as they\nfound some mysterious things in the tunnels under Solomon\u2019s temple in Jerusalem\n, they converted to Paganism ( Hinduism ) and shed their violent methods.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope has NO more\nuse for them. The Vatican started running down the Templar knights as savages .\nIn France, expressions like \"to drink and have sex like a Templar\"\nwere common and widespread. This was a Christian lie as the Templars stopped\ndrinking and was not rapinganybody.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nVatican renamed all whorehouses in Germany as \"Tempelhaus\"\u2014and same\nwith other areas in Europe.&nbsp; Give a dog a\nbad name and then kill it on the streets was a term which germinated from\nVatican.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1307, Philip the\nFair, King of France, and Pope Clement V realized that the Templars were\nseeking to convert Christians back to Paganism and change Europe's religious\nlandscape\u2014which would weaken royalty as well as the church.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In October 1307,\nafter giving the Templars a very bad name , &nbsp;they moved in on the Templars, with the view\nof liquidating this \u201cdecadent, treacherous order\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, the Tamplars were decadent and\ntreacherous while they were Christians \u2013NOT after they converted back to\nPaganism.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vatican send their\nPROPAGANA PARTY door to door to all houses telling LIES to Christians how the\nTemplars were performing secret rites performed in their palaces, rituals of\nSatanist worship ( Vishnu avatar Lord Narasimha really ) , and various immoral\nrelationships like homosexuality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lies spread like wild\nfire \u2013 &nbsp;sacrilegious acts, spit and\nurinate onto the holy Cross, be kissed square on the mouth with the\n\"Oscolum Infame\" or \"The Kiss of Shame\" on the navel and\nbuttocks by the more senior Knights Templars, during the initiation ceremony.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Templars were accused of worshipping\nsatan \u2013a idol half male and halffeale ( Shiva/ Shakti merged Ardhaneshawara ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL WHITE CHRISTIAN\nLIES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/saundarya-lahari-by-adi-shankaracharya.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/saundarya-lahari-by-adi-shankaracharya.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On October 13, 1309,\nthe Tempars &nbsp;were accused in the Christian\ncourts with the following charges:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. That during the\nreception ceremony, new brothers were required to deny Christ, God, The Virgin\nor the Saints on the command of those receiving them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. That the brothers\ncommitted various sacrilegious acts either on the cross or on an image of\nChrist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. That the receptors\npracticed obscene kisses on new entrants, on the mouth, navel or buttocks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. That the priests of\nthe Order did not consecrate the host, and that the brothers did not believe in\nthe sacraments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. That the brothers\npracticed idol worship of a cat or a head.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. That the brothers\nencouraged and permitted the practice of sodomy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. That the Grand\nMaster, or other officials, absolved fellow Templars from their sins.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. That the Templars\nheld their reception ceremonies and chapter meetings in secret and at night.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. That the Templars\nabused the duties of charity and hospitality and used illegal means to acquire\nproperty and increase their wealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Templars confessed\nthat they didn't believe in Jesus anymore as they held him to be \"a false\nprophet\". &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>They now knew of Apollonius\u2014the\nREAL MESSIAH &nbsp;.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/true-founder-of-christianity-jesus.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Templars were\ndisbanded.&nbsp; &nbsp;In 1314, Grand Master Jacques de Molay was\nburned at the stake. Templars who had managed to escape arrest by fleeing to\nother countries were pursued throughout the whole of Christendom. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other countries including Italy and Germany\nfollowed suit, arresting and interrogating the Templars they could apprehend. &nbsp;But for various reasons, most countries\noffered the Templars refuge. &nbsp;On November\n10, 1307, England's Edward II wrote the Pope that he would not persecute the\nTemplars and that in his country, they would remain safe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After two years\nlater, the Pope issued a Papal Bull declaring that the Templars'\n\"unspeakable wickednesses and abominable crimes of notorious heresy\"\nhad now \"come to the knowledge of almost everyone.\" &nbsp;The Pope armtwisted the king and soon, King\nEdward agreed to prosecute the Templars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On March 22nd, Clement\nV issued a Papal Bull under the name of Vox in Excelso (A Voice from on High),\nin which the order was declared to be dissolved and-on paper, at least-its\nexistence erased from the official records:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">... Hark, a voice of\nthe people from the city! a voice from the temple! the voice of the Lord\nrendering recompense to his enemies. The prophet is compelled to exclaim: Give\nthem, Lord, a barren womb and dry breasts. Their worthlessness has been\nrevealed because of their malice. Throw them out of your house, and let their\nroots dry up; let them not bear fruit, and let not this house be any more a\nstumbling block of bitterness or a thorn to hurt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. . . Indeed a little\nwhile ago, about the time of our election as supreme pontiff before we came to\nLyons for our coronation, and afterwards, both there and elsewhere, we received\nsecret intimations against the master, preceptors and other brothers of the\norder of Knights Templar of Jerusalem and also against the order itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. . . [T]he holy Roman\nchurch honoured these brothers and the order with her special support, armed\nthem with the sign of the cross against Christ's enemies, paid them the highest\ntributes of her respect, and strengthened them with various exemptions and\nprivileges; and they experienced in many and various ways her help and that of\nall faithful Christians with repeated gifts of property. Therefore it was\nagainst the lord Jesus Christ himself that they fell into the sin of impious\napostasy, the abominable vice of idolatry, the deadly crime of the Sodomites,\nand various heresies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY BLAME MUSLIMS FOR\nPUNISHED THOSE WHO WANT TO RECONVERT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS THE CHRISTIANS\nWHO FIRST KILLED PEOPLE WHO WANTED TO RECONVERT BACK TO PAGANISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Liquidating the order\nof the Templars proved harder than anticipated. Even though Grand Master de\nMolay and many of his brothers had been eliminated, the order survived, albeit\nby going underground. In France alone, there were more than 9,000\nrepresentatives to be found and across the countries of Europe, thousands of\ncastles and other strongholds were still in their possession.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to historical\nsources of the time, the Inquisition had captured and punished only 620 out of\na total of 2,000 knights. It has since been estimated that the knights' actual\ngrand total was in the vicinity of 20,000, each of whom had a team of seven or\neight Templars of other professions at his service.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A simple calculation based\non eight Templars per knight gives us a total number of 160,000 organizing and\ncarrying out the order's activities, including shipping and commerce. The Pope\nand the French King couldn't possibly locate and confiscate all of their\nproperty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE RECONVERTED PAGAN\nTEMPLARS DID NOT FIGHT BACK, THOUGH THEY HAD THE WHEREWITHAL TO RUN OVER VATICAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This network of active\nmembers across Europe and along the Mediterranean coast, 160,000 strong, was\nthe largest logistical force of their time. In terms of property, they could\nmeasure up to any king and this wealth assured their protection and safety.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite the Papacy's claim that the Templars had been annihilated, not only did\nthey survive the Inquisition by going underground, but they kept on being\nactive, especially in England and in Northern Europe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Louis XVI was\nguillotined in a public square in Paris, one of the onlookers shouted, \"Jacques\nde Molay, you have been avenged!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Vatican's depiction of a druid&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wmMDmkLSx0I/VvZEO4JXwlI/AAAAAAABGq8/fyxm5vd-9Z4T2xLwbuJwkYAfYXquzH6Tw/s1600/An_Arch_Druid_in_His_JudJJicial_Habit.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nora Chadwick, an\nexpert in medieval Welsh and Irish literature, wrote that druids were &nbsp;great philosophers, and that Druids have not\nbeen involved in human sacrifice, and that such accusations were imperialist\nRoman Christian propaganda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost the entire white\nskinned historians have condemned druids of human and animal sacrifices .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild controlled\nNational Geographic recently revealed FAKE evidence that \"[suggests] that\ndruids possibly committed cannibalism and ritual human sacrifice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what else is new ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white man ruled\nIndia and they blamed Lord Shiva \u2013A COSMIC ALLEGORY-- of being a cannibal (\ndead meat only pleaJJJe ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/aghoris-corpse-eaters-of-india-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/aghoris-corpse-eaters-of-india-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They blamed Hindus of sacrificing\nanimals/ humans, and Hindu temples as whore houses.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They made the Hindu\nself loathing and converted them to Christianity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu temples with\nstatues in sexual positions were always OUTSIDE the temple.&nbsp; Every act of immoral fornication has its\npunishment too mentioned as a sculpture \u2013usually decaptitation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The IMMORAL white\ninvader chipped off the punishments \u2013and left only the deviant sex behind.&nbsp; In many cases the white invader created HOMOSEXUAL\nSEX &nbsp;idols .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SACK OF ROME on 24<sup>th</sup>\nAugust 410 AD , was a Christian thingy .&nbsp;\nI have been to Rome and I know.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They vandalized only\npagan structures and temples.&nbsp; Never mind\nthe Vatican propaganda and the nonsense written by Rothschild historians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emperor Theodosius the\nGreat, died in 395 AD , after which the Roman Empire was divided into eastern\nand western halves under his sons, Arcadius in the east and the ten-year-old\nHonorius in the west. Honorius\u2019s capital was moved from Rome to Ravenna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Visigoths ( Arian\nChristians ) appeared outside the city in force and the senate prepared to\nresist, but in the middle of the night rebellious slaves opened the Salarian\nGate of Rome to the attackers, who poured in and set fire .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Arian concept of\nChrist is that the Son of God did not always exist, but was created by God the\nFather. Two Roman emperors, Constantius II and Valens, became Arians and so did\nGothic, Vandal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Attila the Hun's\ndeath, Vatican had a secret alliance with the fearsome Vandals, to kill druids\nand tell the pagans CONVERT OR DIE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>On 2 June 455, Pope Leo\nthe Great received Genseric the King of Vandals. &nbsp;</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The sack of 455 was the second of three sacks of Rome; it was conducted\nby the Vandals, who were then at war with the usurping Western Roman Emperor\nPetronius Maximus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Aralic was hosted by Pope Innocent 1 in\nthis palace and was rewarded a massive solid gold golden Ciborium, which was a\ngift from the Emperor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The Laterani\nlost their properties to Christian Emperor Constantine who in turn gave it to\nthe Catholic Church in 311.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let truth be told.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A common claim made by Christians is that\nChristianity single-handedly kept alight the guttering flame of learning during\nthe Dark Ages, in the face of marauding wild barbarians. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Church was largely responsible for\nplunging pagan Europe into ignorance and darkness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Towards the end of the fourth century for\nexample Goths destroyed much of the Western Empire, including great pagan cities\nlike Delphi and Athens. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">But these savage Goths were not the pagan barbarians\nof traditional history books, they were hardcore Catholic Christians! &nbsp;&nbsp;Read this line a million times!!</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
