font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads says:\n\"Aham Brahmasmi\" - \"I am Brahman, I am the totality, really I am\neverything.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-y9NnKt9jVP8/VvKmAhCqDtI/AAAAAAABGic/bc3U2A_1qaMSG1QLF_VcEjuulMckcm_Ow/s1600/imrrrrtages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-y9NnKt9jVP8/VvKmAhCqDtI/AAAAAAABGic/bc3U2A_1qaMSG1QLF_VcEjuulMckcm_Ow/s320/imrrrrtages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a gurukul when a Maharishi\n( guru ) leads his shishya pupil to Anandamaya kosha, the last words they\nexchange is AHAM BRAHMASMI,-- and they part probably never to meet again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to transport\nman by the ship of Brahma-Vidya to the farthest shore of the great ocean\n(Koshas), the Sruti says, This Atman is Brahman; Thou art That.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE WAY OF THE GURUKUL WAS AMAZING.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n</b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Samavartana (literally,\ngraduation&nbsp; ceremony ) is the ceremony\nassociated with the end of formal education of Vedas in \u2018Gurukul\u2019 or \u2018Pa\u1e6dhashala\u2019.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This ceremony marks the end of\nstudenthood. This also marks the end of Brahmacharya ashrama of life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It signifies a Hindu\u2019s\nreadiness to enter grihastashrama ( householder, married life).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The stuent has now\ncrossed the ocean of learning thanks to his guru.&nbsp;&nbsp; The student offers Guru Dakshina to his Guru\na simple betel leaf in gratitude with holy fire as witness.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Vivaha Samskara is the 15<sup>th</sup> out of 16 samskaras.</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: Bride's father handing over his daughter to the ( &nbsp;chosen and horoscope matched ) &nbsp;groom, with the priest solemnizing the ritual. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">This \"arranged marriage \" samskara creates an indelible impression on consciousness and hence divorce is the least on this planet among Hindus by percentage .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dFktWlUsgE4/VvKzJdzsqKI/AAAAAAABGjM/PDLqWxKVMAst66XnrH4wOPcPjTgFSIFlA/s1600/Ae52.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dFktWlUsgE4/VvKzJdzsqKI/AAAAAAABGjM/PDLqWxKVMAst66XnrH4wOPcPjTgFSIFlA/s1600/Ae52.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SUwyKp-sg6k/VvKzZka6mrI/AAAAAAABGjQ/_0dlY9kceAsiiRBcOzL3UCzIqlR1xFQyA/s1600/Ad32.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SUwyKp-sg6k/VvKzZka6mrI/AAAAAAABGjQ/_0dlY9kceAsiiRBcOzL3UCzIqlR1xFQyA/s1600/Ad32.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aj49dL3V-aM/VvKzrgUSgHI/AAAAAAABGjU/-5lqpvc5V_oXuJHOMUDRWbC0QXTTYs1jQ/s1600/J34s0.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-aj49dL3V-aM/VvKzrgUSgHI/AAAAAAABGjU/-5lqpvc5V_oXuJHOMUDRWbC0QXTTYs1jQ/s1600/J34s0.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">HINDUS HAVE ARRANGED MARRIAGES .&nbsp; </b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/marriage-sans-fights-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/marriage-sans-fights-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/KmPIJLWzUWw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/KmPIJLWzUWw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n</b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>||\nMaangalyam tantunaanena mama jeevana hetunaa:<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>kanthe\nbandhaami subhage twam jeeva saradaam satam ||<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QvJ92H4n2nc/VvOvlWbmm4I/AAAAAAABGnA/Dkx0qPXuXhkj6HyFnuYz_1pxCcKQWF8hw/s1600/IMG_22frt82.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QvJ92H4n2nc/VvOvlWbmm4I/AAAAAAABGnA/Dkx0qPXuXhkj6HyFnuYz_1pxCcKQWF8hw/s1600/IMG_22frt82.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>This is\na sacred thread. This is essential for my long life. I tie this around your\nneck, O maiden having many auspicious attributes! May you live happily for a\nhundred years (with me).</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/64-kalas-of-ancient-india-for-girl.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/64-kalas-of-ancient-india-for-girl.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-x3yDT83cmXc/VvOyYc9cHoI/AAAAAAABGnM/w5J2ERqJxsANI5ohB-YNJ7yAZPpqrPRKg/s1600/3bf2e5_06105f888826e0c6w433cca5dc9b518f5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-x3yDT83cmXc/VvOyYc9cHoI/AAAAAAABGnM/w5J2ERqJxsANI5ohB-YNJ7yAZPpqrPRKg/s400/3bf2e5_06105f888826e0c6w433cca5dc9b518f5.jpg\" width=\"280\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vedic mantra for Saptapadi with each circle around\nthe sacred fire are as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ekam ishe vishnutva anvet</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the first step, may Vishu lead you to happiness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Dve urje vishnutva anvet</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the second step, may Vishnu lead you to prosperity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Trenni vrataya vishnutva anvet</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the third step, may Vishnu lead you to observance of\nduty<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chatvaari mayo vishnutva anvet</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the fourth step, may Vishnu lead you to source of\nall bliss<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5:<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> Pancha Pashubhyo vinutva anvet</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the fifth step, may Vishnu lead you to welfare of environment\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Shadraayasya Poshaya vishnutva anvet</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the sixth step, may Vishnu lead you to health and fortune<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7: <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sapta Saptabhyo hotrebhyo vishnutva anvet</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the seventh step, may Vishnu lead you to observance\nof the seven-fold religious duties<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The groom then recites a prayer, seeking the bride's\nfriendship:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sakha saptapada bhava<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sakhayau saptapada babhuva<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sakhyanthe gameyam<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sakyathe mayosham<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sakhyanme mayoshataha</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the seven steps, we have become friends,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me reach your friendship<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me not be severed from your friendship<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let your friendship not severed from me</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-highlight: yellow;\">The bride, in the process, takes each step by\nresponding \u201c I shall cherish and abide by your aspirations\u201d</span><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-highlight: yellow;\">So as not to lose count around the fire &nbsp;, there are 7 small heaps of rice to be trampled on by the bride&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-highlight: yellow;\">.</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">During this circumambulation ritual, the groom walks with\nthe bride to the right side of the sacred fire. All along, he holds his wife's\nright hand in his right hand or the pallu may be tied.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marriage is considered legally complete only after\n\u2018Saptapadi\u2019 is performed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"background: aqua; mso-highlight: aqua;\">At the conclusion of the seven circumambulations steps, the groom addresses\nhis wife with a moving statement from the 7000 year old Vedas summarized below:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: aqua; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dear Wife! By taking these seven steps, you have become my\ndearest friend. I pledge my unfailing loyalty to you. Let us stay together for\nthe rest of our lives. Let us not separate from each other ever. Let us be of\none mind in carrying out our responsibilities as householders (grihasthas). Let\nus love and cherish each other and enjoy nourishing food and good health. Let\nus discharge our prescribed Vedic duties to our elders, ancestors, rishis,\ncreatures, and gods. Let our aspirations be united. I will be the Shukla or\nlife force and may you be the bearer of that Shukla. Let me be the mind and let\nyou be the speech. May you follow me to conceive children and gain worldly as\nwell as cosmic awareness. May all auspiciousness come your way.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background: aqua; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xJNT1rRN3wk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xJNT1rRN3wk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 24.64px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18pt; line-height: 27.6px;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Country&nbsp; , serif;\">&nbsp;Vietnam/&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4 &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under Vedic Hindu traditions marriage is a lifelong\ncommitment of one wife and one husband. There is NO word named DIVORCE in the\nSanskrit dictionary .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Facing each other the\nbride and the bridegroom speak as follows:</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ye learned people\nassembled at this sacred ceremony know it for certain that we two hereby accept\neach other as companions for life and agree to live together most cordially as\nhusband and wife. May the hearts of us both be blended and beat in unison. May\nwe love each other like the very breath of our lives. As the all-pervading God\nsustains the universe, so may we sustain each other. As a preceptor loves his\ndisciple, so may we love each other steadfastly and faithfully. - &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RigVeda\nX.85.47 &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Addressing the bride,\nthe bridegroom says:</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Distant though we were,\none from the other, we stand now united. May we be of one mind and spirit!\nThrough the grace of God, may the eyes radiate benevolence. Be thou my shield.\nMay thou have a cheerful heart and a smiling face. May thou be a true devotee\nof God and mother of heroes. May thou have at heart the welfare of all living\nbeings! -&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rig Veda X.85.44 &nbsp; 5000 BC <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bride:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I pray that henceforth\nI may follow thy path. May my body be free from disease and defect and may I\never enjoy the bliss of your companionship!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bridegroom:&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the heavens are permanently stable, as the\nearth is permanently stable, as these mountains are permanently stable, and as\nthe entire universe is permanent stable, so may my wife be permanently settled\nin our family! -</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rig Veda X.173.4<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Marriage and the\nensuing ghrastha&nbsp; (householder) stage is\ndeemed crucial within Hindu society.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Not many people know\nthat an unmarried Hindu or a widower cannot do a HOMAM ( yajna ). Such is the\nimportance given to women in Hindu society.&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India marriage has been looked upon as having been\ndesigned by the cosmos ( by matching horoscopes ) and considered as a \u2018\u2019sacred\noneness witnessed by AGNI itself\u2018\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The boy and girl belonging to good families and the same\nvarna get married so that there is NO clash of cultures. Culture shocks can\ndrive wedges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The girl goes to the boys house after marriage \u2013&nbsp; her only possessions being the things she\nwears on her body. &nbsp; &nbsp;Dowry evils were\ncreated by the FAKE MUTTS of the white invaders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rituals were designed to build a solid foundation for\nDharmic living&nbsp; .&nbsp; Vivaaha Samskara influences the life of a\ncouple as equal partners by enabling them to take their rightful place as\ncreators in society.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>Forget about dowry , in\nancient India by SWAYAMWAR the girls decided whom she wanted to marry, from\nseveral prospective grooms.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>There is NO dowry in\nany of our ancient texts \u2013like SATI.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>SATI was unknown till\nthe white invader came to India. &nbsp; &nbsp;I dare anybody to prove me wrong !</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Divorce was not\nallowed, in ancient India, as this amounted to breaking sacred vows .Those who\nleft their partners were often ostracised from society-&nbsp; unless it was by mutual consent ..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India women were\noften married very early, to protect their chastity and because women were\nconsidered to mature much quicker than young men. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The so-called child marriage was often akin to\na system of betrothal and marriage was only consummated when the bride reached\nadulthood. &nbsp; I dare anybody to prove me wrong.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The giving of a dowry,\nas a symbol of the father's affection towards his daughter, is an ancient\npractice.&nbsp; Nothing is demanded by the\ngroom\u2019s family.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All lies by the white historian\nis not gonna work anymore !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n</b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; Sankara finally emerged victorious. But Ma\u1e47\u1e0dana's wife, who was the judge, would not accept an ascetic as having complete knowledge since he did not have any knowledge about kama sastras (rules about marital life). Sankara was then given a month to research certain aspects of sex-love sciences and then resume the debate. According to legend, he entered into the body of a king who had just died in order to learn these sciences. Later, after obtaining the necessary knowledge, the debate resumed. --UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SHANKARACHARYA MUST HAVE LEARNT ABOUT WESTERN PRACTICES LIKE ANAL SEX, ORAL SEX , ANIMAL SEX , GOLDEN SHOWER AND EATING SHIT ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">TEE HEE !</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DONT MAKE ME SAY ANYTHING MORE.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SHELDON POLLOCK HAD THANKED UR ANANTHAMURTHY WHO PISSED ON A IDOL WORSHIPPED BY HINDUS ( preface and acknowledgements 3rd from last para &nbsp;).</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE ASK PM MODI, TO TAKE NOTE OF THIS SARCASTIC \"PEANUT GALLERY\" COMMENT OF NR NARAYANAMURTHYs SON -- &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">-AND DEAL WITH THIS GRUESOME FATHER /SON TWOSOME ACCORDINGLY.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE ARE TALKING ABOUT BHARATMATAs &nbsp;PAST &nbsp;!</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">..</span><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; 7 astral layers corresponding to the 7 human chakras.<br />\n<br />\nthe topmost layer ( 7th ) is vaikunta ( corresponding to sahasrara chakra , where shiva shati merges after kundalini raise into a 6 pointed star )<br />\n<br />\nonly souls who attained MOKSHA ( NIL karmic accumulated baggage ) can merge with GOD ( brahman -the morphogenetic consciousness field ) of the 7th astral layer, after death.<br />\n<br />\nthe dead bodies of such people who attained MOKSHA ( jivan mukkt while living on earth ) are BURIED.<br />\n<br />\njivan mukht sages like apollonius can do astral travel. their soul leave the body takes a ride and them re-enters the body.<br />\n<br />\nyou are NOT what you see in the mirror.<br />\n<br />\nYOU are a just tiny BALL OF ENERGY within you. this ball ( soul ) can never be destroyed .<br />\n<br />\nwe do namaste to the GREAT soul in the other man<br />\n<br />\nas long as you have accumulated baggage of karma , your soul is parked in one of the bottom 6 astral layers .<br />\n<br />\nyou ( your soul ) is re-inducted back on earth , from any of the bottom 6 astral layers to give you another chance to reduce your karmic baggage -from the bottom 6 layers.<br />\n<br />\nif your karmic baggage is too high, you will take re-birth to suffer.<br />\n<br />\nthe field of brahmAn ( god ) , does not treat all the same.<br />\n<br />\nthis is why some are beautiful having brains who are respected , while some are ugly lepers with NIL brains who are despised .<br />\n<br />\nUNLIKE WHAT FAKE GURUS HAVE BEEN SPREADING-- YOU ( SOUL ) ARE FORGING YOUR DESTINY ON YOUR OWN TERMS WHILE ON PLANET EARTH .<br />\n<br />\nonce you evolve and become human, you do NOT take re-birth as an animal .<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO HEAVEN AND HELL CONCEPT IN HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nHINDUS MUST CREMATE THE DEAD BODY--<br />\n<br />\nWHILE THE BODY BURNS , YOUR SKULL POPS AND CREATES A PERSONAL TSUNAMI WAVE ( SOLITION CARRIER WAVE ) AND YOUR SOUL RIDES UP TO ANY OF THE 6 ASTRAL LAYERS .<br />\n<br />\nno other soul trapped on earth can take a piggy back ride .<br />\n<br />\nif your skull does not pop your eldest son must break your skull with a heavy rod to generate that soliton wave while being cremated.<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU ARE BURIED ( LIKE MUSLIMS/ CHRISTIANS/ VEERASHAIVAS ) YOU ( SOUL ) IS TRAPPED ON EARTH FOREVER --TO BE MISERABLE AND LOST.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DO NOT HAVE EGO, YOU ARE BURIED AFTER DEATH -- LIKE SAGES , AND SMALL CHILDREN OF LESS THAN 27 MONTHS OF AGE.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA URGES YOU TO SHED YOUR EGO AND LEAD A SIMPLE LIFE WHILE ON EARTH.<br />\n<br />\nYOUR EGO IS YOUR ( SOULs ) GREATEST ENEMY.<br />\n<br />\nEVOLUTION IS YOUR ( SOULs ) EVOLUTION UP THE LADDER -- TO THE 7 LAYERS.<br />\n<br />\nEVOLUTION IS NOT MAD MAN CHARLES DARWINs BULLSHIT THEORY OF MAN TO MONKEY.<br />\n<br />\nCONSCIOUS ANIMALS ELEPHANT, BONOBOS, DOLPHINS etc ARE IN LINE TO BECOME HUMAN AFTER DEATH.<br />\n<br />\nconscious animals can see colour and can see themselves in the mirror.<br />\n<br />\nwe do shraddh for our dead parents after death , so that your parents soul can get one layer lift propelled by attendants), Who are Brahmana-spati of the brahmas (prayers), the wisest among the wise, Who abound in treasure beyond all measure, the most brilliant one. Please come to us by Listening to our Prayers and be Present in the Seat of this Sacred Sacrificial Altar.. (Rig Veda 2.23.1- 5000 BC )</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">ni shhu sida ganapate ganeshhu tvamahurvipratamam kavinam |</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">na rite tvat.h kriyate kinchanare mahamarkam maghavan.h chitramarcha || (Rig Veda 10.112.9)</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\u0928\u093f \u0937\u0941 \u0938\u0940\u0926 \u0917\u0923\u092a\u0924\u0947 \u0917\u0923\u0947\u0937\u0941 \u0924\u094d\u0935\u093e\u092e\u093e\u0939\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093f\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u092e\u0902 \u0915\u0935\u0940\u0928\u093e\u092e\u094d\u0964</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\u0928 \u090b\u0924\u0947 \u0924\u094d\u0935\u0924\u094d\u0915\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u093f\u0902 \u091a\u0928\u093e\u0930\u0947 \u092e\u0939\u093e\u092e\u0930\u094d\u0915\u0902 \u092e\u0918\u0935\u091e\u094d\u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0930\u092e\u0930\u094d\u091a\u0965&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">(\u090b\u0917\u094d \u0967\u0966-\u0967\u0967\u0968-\u096f)</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Sit down among the worshippers, O Ganapati, the best sage among the sages. text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ini4iVj_IYw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ini4iVj_IYw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WlTYi8OvHuo/VvA_OriCaFI/AAAAAAABGe0/cISfYK17JFsuc0yKnHhyaAwxoobG6EGyw/s1600/dommwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WlTYi8OvHuo/VvA_OriCaFI/AAAAAAABGe0/cISfYK17JFsuc0yKnHhyaAwxoobG6EGyw/s400/dommwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Va_q7bDj4l0/VvAP0-38cjI/AAAAAAABGcw/s_Mpvcl9xSAODrfmNd0wTVRP1rYV2sKCw/s1600/GarbaCFge_Placard.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"392\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Va_q7bDj4l0/VvAP0-38cjI/AAAAAAABGcw/s_Mpvcl9xSAODrfmNd0wTVRP1rYV2sKCw/s640/GarbaCFge_Placard.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I am watching EXPERTS (\nsic ) discuss waste management on TV .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">PATHETIC !</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">India is 40 years\nbehind the rest of the developed world in garbage management<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me put down my ship\u2019s\nWASTE MANAGEMENT PLAN I used a quarter century ago.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-06Bqyb9kbLU/VvAQFDKHNZI/AAAAAAABGc0/nlOPPWcKpKgq6w3Qb_TWTthCSvu0bZw_w/s1600/MarpolE%2BAnnex%2BV_0.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bRZkk6qnh-A/VvAQx8-dvDI/AAAAAAABGc8/s-W-l5WkAEkU_EU9M4cswpROeQox1ctfQ/s1600/2012-11-07-shipsDD-garbage-management-under-revised-marpol-annex-v-figure-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
